atk-s0504a:36_0: Tattha itivuttakaṃ nāma ekakanipāto, dukanipāto, tikanipāto, catukkanipātoti catunipātasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0504a:36_1: Tampi vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ;
atk-s0504a:36_2: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
atk-s0504a:36_3: nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ; suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā, udānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:36_4: itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu itivuttakaṅgabhūtaṃ.
atk-s0504a:38: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0504a:39_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0504a:39_1: Suttato ekakanipāte tāva sattavīsati suttāni, dukanipāte dvāvīsati, tikanipāte paññāsa,
atk-s0504a:39_2: catukkanipāte terasāti dvādasādhikasuttasatasaṅgahaṃ. Tassa nipātesu ekakanipāto
atk-s0504a:39_3: ādi, vaggesu pāṭibhogavaggo, suttesu lobhasuttaṃ. Tassāpi “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0504a:39_4: āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi. Sā panāyaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti
atk-s0504a:39_5: vinayapiṭake tantimāruḷhā eva. Yo panettha nidānakosallatthaṃ vattabbo kathāmaggo,
atk-s0504a:39_6: sopi sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya vitthārato vuttoyevāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:41_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatātiādikaṃ nidānaṃ. Ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahathātiādikaṃ
atk-s0504a:41_1: suttaṃ. Tattha vuttaṃ bhagavatātiādīni nāmapadāni. Itīti nipātapadaṃ. Pajahathāti
atk-s0504a:41_2: ettha pa-iti upasaggapadaṃ, jahathā-ti ākhyātapadaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:42_0: Atthato pana vuttasaddo tāva saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamakaraṇe kesohāraṇe
atk-s0504a:42_1: jīvitavuttiyaṃ pavuttabhāve pāvacanabhāvena pavattite ajjhesane kathaneti evamādīsu
atk-s0504a:44: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti. –
atk-s0504a:45_0: Ādīsu vapane āgato. “No ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamakaraṇe.
atk-s0504a:45_1: “Kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesohāraṇe. “Pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena
atk-s0504a:45_2: cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto
atk-s0504a:45_3: abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pavuttabhāve. “Yesamidaṃ etarahi, brāhmaṇā,
atk-s0504a:45_4: porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke
atk-s0504a:45_5: pana – “vutto gaṇo vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu ajjhene. “Vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:45_6: dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu kathane. Idhāpi kathane
atk-s0504a:45_7: daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā vuttaṃ kathitaṃ bhāsitanti attho.
atk-s0504a:46_0: Dutiyo pana vuttasaddo vacane ciṇṇabhāve ca veditabbo. Hi-iti jātu vibyattanti etasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:46_1: atthe nipāto. So idāni vuccamānasuttassa bhagavato vibyattaṃ bhāsitabhāvaṃ joteti.
atk-s0504a:46_2: Vācakasaddasannidhāne hi payuttā nipātā. Tehi vattabbamatthaṃ jotenti. Etanti ayaṃ etasaddo –
atk-s0504a:47: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0504a:53_0: Ādīsu yathāvutte āsannapaccakkhe āgato. “Appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ
atk-s0504a:53_1: sīlamattakaṃ, yena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”tiādīsu pana vakkhamāne
atk-s0504a:53_2: āsannapaccakkhe. Idhāpi vakkhamāneyeva daṭṭhabbo. Saṅgāyanavasena vakkhamānañhi suttaṃ
atk-s0504a:54: Bhagavatāti ettha bhagavāti garuvacanaṃ. Garuṃ hi loke bhagavāti vadanti. Tathāgato ca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sattānaṃ garu, tasmā bhagavāti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:56: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:57_0: Seṭṭhavācakañhi vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ. Atha vā vuccatīti
atk-s0504a:57_1: vacanaṃ, attho. Tasmā bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti bhagavāti iminā vacanena vacanīyo
atk-s0504a:57_2: yo attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti
atk-s0504a:57_3: garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇaṃ vā sātisayaṃ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti
atk-s0504a:65: Imissā gāthāya ca vasena bhagavāti padassa attho vattabbo. So panāyaṃ attho sabbākārena visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vuttoti. Tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:66: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā, bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:67: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
atk-s0504a:68: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”.
atk-s0504a:69_0: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā
atk-s0504a:69_1: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ, samādhi, paññā, vimutti,
atk-s0504a:69_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī, ottappaṃ, saddhā, vīriyaṃ, sati, sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi,
atk-s0504a:69_3: cittavisuddhi, diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho, vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni,
atk-s0504a:69_4: tayo sammāvitakkā, tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro
atk-s0504a:69_5: sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso
atk-s0504a:69_6: paṭisambhidā, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni,
atk-s0504a:69_7: pañca padhāniyaṅgāni, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni,
atk-s0504a:69_8: pañca balāni, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā
atk-s0504a:69_9: saññā, cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā,
atk-s0504a:69_10: cha anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
atk-s0504a:69_11: aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta sappurisadhammā, satta
atk-s0504a:69_12: nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, satta dakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā, satta khīṇāsavabaladesanā,
atk-s0504a:69_13: aṭṭha paññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā, aṭṭhasammattāni, aṭṭha lokadhammātikkamo, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni,
atk-s0504a:69_14: aṭṭha akkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭha abhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā,
atk-s0504a:69_15: nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, nava sattāvāsadesanā,
atk-s0504a:69_16: nava āghātappaṭivinayā, nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakaraṇā
atk-s0504a:69_17: dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā,
atk-s0504a:69_18: dasa asekkhā dhammā, dasa tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā,
atk-s0504a:69_19: terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā
atk-s0504a:69_20: ānāpānassati, soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
atk-s0504a:69_21: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattati
atk-s0504a:69_23: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti, evamādayo
atk-s0504a:69_24: anantā aparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā vijjanti
atk-s0504a:69_25: upalabbhanti. Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe.
atk-s0504a:69_26: Ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto. Evaṃ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:72_0: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
atk-s0504a:72_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā
atk-s0504a:72_3: pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
atk-s0504a:72_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāgoti
atk-s0504a:72_5: pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ, lokatthacariyā, ñātatthacariyā,
atk-s0504a:72_6: buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo saṅkhepato vā puññasambhārañāṇasambhārā buddhakaradhammā,
atk-s0504a:72_7: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni yathā
atk-s0504a:72_8: hānabhāgiyā, saṃkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā, vā na honti; atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva
atk-s0504a:72_9: honti; evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti
atk-s0504a:72_10: bhagavā; niruttinayena takārassa gakāraṃ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte
atk-s0504a:72_11: buddhakaradhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:74: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
atk-s0504a:75_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
atk-s0504a:75_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca niccakappaṃ vani
atk-s0504a:75_2: bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyesu dhammesu kusalādīsu
atk-s0504a:75_3: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
atk-s0504a:75_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhu pariññeyyaṃ …pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā aneke pariññeyyabhāgā,
atk-s0504a:75_5: “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā pahātabbabhāgā,
atk-s0504a:75_8: bhāvetabbā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ
atk-s0504a:75_9: gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo
atk-s0504a:75_10: dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu
atk-s0504a:75_11: patiṭṭhapeyyanti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi. Sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā
atk-s0504a:77: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato”.
atk-s0504a:78_0: Kathaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ
atk-s0504a:78_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito
atk-s0504a:78_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
atk-s0504a:78_3: buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi. Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite
atk-s0504a:78_4: anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi. Vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena
atk-s0504a:78_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:79: “Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
atk-s0504a:80: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
atk-s0504a:81_0: Kathaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhagavā. Tathāgato
atk-s0504a:81_5: so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena ca thutighosena
atk-s0504a:81_8: ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti
atk-s0504a:81_9: evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
atk-s0504a:81_11: Ye ca tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā
atk-s0504a:81_12: tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā. Tathā
atk-s0504a:81_13: hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti, tassa vā āṇaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvato. Tenevāha –
atk-s0504a:84_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati; evameva kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:84_1: yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
atk-s0504a:85: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa takārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa gakāraṃ katvā.
atk-s0504a:87: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:88_0: Kathaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo
atk-s0504a:88_1: pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
atk-s0504a:88_2: chaḍḍayi. Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle, hatthipālakumārakāle, ayogharapaṇḍitakāle,
atk-s0504a:88_4: rajjasiriyā pariccattattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ natthi. Carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ
atk-s0504a:88_6: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā
atk-s0504a:88_7: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho. Tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni
atk-s0504a:88_8: nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokavisesasannissayā
atk-s0504a:91_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma koṭṭhāsā. Te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
atk-s0504a:91_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā. Te ca bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ,
atk-s0504a:91_2: sabbaṃ yogaṃ, sabbaṃ ganthaṃ, sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, samucchinditvā amatadhātuṃ samadhigacchanto
atk-s0504a:91_3: vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi, na paccāgami. Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ,
atk-s0504a:91_4: āpaṃ, tejaṃ, vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ, sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jīvhaṃ, kāyaṃ, manaṃ, rūpe, sadde, gandhe,
atk-s0504a:91_5: rase, phoṭṭhabbe, dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ, cakkhusamphassaṃ …pe…
atk-s0504a:91_6: manosamphassaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ
atk-s0504a:91_7: saññaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ; cakkhusamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ
atk-s0504a:91_8: cetanaṃ; rūpataṇhaṃ …pe… dhammataṇhaṃ; rūpavitakkaṃ…pe… dhammavitakkaṃ; rūpavicāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0504a:92: “Yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tathāgato puna paccāgamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0504a:93_0: Evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje
atk-s0504a:93_1: hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho
atk-s0504a:93_2: pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya dhammaṃ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:94: “Dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā pageva adhammā, kullūpamaṃ, vo bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi, nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi. –
atk-s0504a:97: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato”.
atk-s0504a:99: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
atk-s0504a:100: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
atk-s0504a:101_0: Tena bhagavatā. Arahatāti kilesehi ārakattā, anavasesānaṃ vā kilesārīnaṃ hatattā,
atk-s0504a:101_1: saṃsāracakkassa vā arānaṃ hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti
atk-s0504a:101_2: imehi kāraṇehi arahatā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:102_0: Ettha ca bhagavatāti imināssa bhāgyavantatādīpanena kappānaṃ anekesu asaṅkhyeyyesu
atk-s0504a:102_5: dīpitā hoti. Tadubhayenapi lokiyasarikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvo, gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi
atk-s0504a:102_6: abhigamanīyatā, tathā abhigatānañca tesaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo,
atk-s0504a:102_7: āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā, lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca pakāsitā hoti.
atk-s0504a:103_1: caraṇasampadā dīpitā hoti. Arahatāti iminā sabbavijjāsu sikhāppattaāsavakkhayañāṇādhigamaparidīpanena
atk-s0504a:103_2: vijjāsampadā dīpitā hoti. Purimena vā antarāyikaniyyānikadhammānaṃ aviparītavibhattabhāvadīpanena
atk-s0504a:104_3: ca, upasamādhiṭṭhānapaññādhiṭṭhānapāripūri pakāsitā hoti. Tathā hi bhagavato bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-s0504a:104_6: upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, pāramitāhi eva parahitūpāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ pāripūrigataṃ.
atk-s0504a:105_0: Tathā ‘yācakajanaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmī’ti paṭijānanena paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dānena
atk-s0504a:105_3: ca dānena paññuttaratāya ca paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ pāripūrigataṃ. Iminā nayena sesapāramīsupi
atk-s0504a:105_4: caturādhiṭṭhānapāripūri veditabbā. Sabbā hi pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgābhibyañjitā
atk-s0504a:105_8: diṭṭhivisuddhi. Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamenassa saṃvāsena sīlaṃ veditabbaṃ, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
atk-s0504a:105_9: saṃvohārena soceyyaṃ veditabbaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena āpadāsu thāmo veditabbo,
atk-s0504a:106_0: Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena aduṭṭho adhivāseti, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena aluddho
atk-s0504a:106_2: amūḷho vinodeti. Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena cassa nekkhammasukhappatti, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
atk-s0504a:106_4: sambodhisukhappatti dīpitā hoti. Saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena vā vivekajapītisukhappatti,
atk-s0504a:107_3: anubodhappaṭivedhasiddhi dīpitā hoti. Saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena ca tapasiddhi, cāgādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena
atk-s0504a:107_5: buddhisiddhi, tena ca nibbānasiddhi. Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena catuariyasaccābhisamayappaṭilābho,
atk-s0504a:108_0: Aparo nayo – bhagavatāti etena sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasampattiabhikaṅkhādīpanena
atk-s0504a:108_1: tathāgatassa mahākaruṇā pakāsitā hoti. Arahatāti etena pahānasampattidīpanena pahānapaññā
atk-s0504a:108_2: pakāsitā hoti. Tattha paññāyassa dhammarajjapatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṃvibhāgo; paññāya
atk-s0504a:108_4: karuṇāya paradukkhappaṭikārārambho. Paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo;
atk-s0504a:108_5: paññāya sayaṃ taraṇaṃ, karuṇāya paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ; paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya
atk-s0504a:108_6: buddhakiccasiddhi. Karuṇāya vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ saṃsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha
atk-s0504a:108_7: anabhirati. Tathā karuṇāya paresaṃ avihiṃsanaṃ, paññāya sayaṃ parehi abhāyanaṃ; karuṇāya
atk-s0504a:108_8: paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati, paññāya attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati. Tathā
atk-s0504a:108_9: karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya anattantapo. Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
atk-s0504a:109_0: Tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā; karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo, paññāya
atk-s0504a:109_1: unnatābhāvo. Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho, paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha
atk-s0504a:109_2: virattacitto; paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto, karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya
atk-s0504a:109_3: pavatto. Yathā hi karuṇā tathāgatassa sinehasokavirahitā, evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti
atk-s0504a:109_4: aññamaññaṃ visodhitā paramavisuddhāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha paññākhettaṃ balāni, karuṇākhettaṃ
atk-s0504a:109_5: vesārajjāni. Tesu balasamāyogena parehi na abhibhuyyati, vesārajjasamāyogena pare
atk-s0504a:109_6: abhibhavati. Balehi satthusampadāsiddhi, vesārajjehi sāsanasampadāsiddhi. Tathā balehi
atk-s0504a:110_0: Kasmā panettha “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā”ti vatvā puna “vutta”nti vuttaṃ? Anussavapaṭikkhepena
atk-s0504a:110_1: niyamadassanatthaṃ. Yathā hi kenaci parato sutvā vuttaṃ yadipi ca jānantena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:110_2: na teneva vuttaṃ parenapi vuttattā. Na ca taṃ tena vuttameva, apica kho sutampi,
atk-s0504a:110_3: na evamidha. Bhagavatā hi parato asutvā sayambhuñāṇena attanā adhigatameva vuttanti
atk-s0504a:110_4: imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:110_5: bhagavatā” tañca kho bhagavatāva vuttaṃ, na aññena, vuttameva ca, na sutanti. Adhikavacanañhi
atk-s0504a:110_6: aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti na punaruttidoso. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
atk-s0504a:111_0: Tathā pubbaracanābhāvadassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddhatāya
atk-s0504a:111_1: ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, na tassa
atk-s0504a:111_2: kāraṇā dānādīnaṃ viya pubbaracanākiccaṃ atthi. Tenetaṃ dasseti – “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0504a:111_3: tañca kho na pubbaracanāvasena takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ, apica kho veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
atk-s0504a:112_0: Appaṭivattiyavacanabhāvadassanatthaṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Yañhi bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:112_1: vuttaṃ, vuttameva taṃ, na kenaci paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā akkharasampattiyā atthasampattiyā ca. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:113: “Etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ kenaci samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:115_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘na yidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:115_1: yaṃ samaṇena gotamena paññattaṃ, ahamidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0504a:117_0: Atha vā sotūnaṃ atthanipphādakabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Yañhi
atk-s0504a:117_1: paresaṃ āsayādiṃ ajānantena asabbaññunā adese akāle vā vuttaṃ, taṃ saccampi samānaṃ
atk-s0504a:117_2: sotūnaṃ atthanipphādane asamatthatāya avuttaṃ nāma siyā, pageva asaccaṃ. Bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:117_3: pana sammāsambuddhabhāvato sammadeva paresaṃ āsayādiṃ desakālaṃ atthasiddhiñca jānantena
atk-s0504a:117_4: vuttaṃ ekantena sotūnaṃ yathādhippetatthanipphādanato vuttameva, natthi tassa avuttatāpariyāyo.
atk-s0504a:117_5: Tasmā sotūnaṃ atthanipphādakabhāvadassanatthampi dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Apica
atk-s0504a:117_6: yathā na taṃ sutaṃ nāma, yaṃ na viññātatthaṃ yañca na tathattāya paṭipannaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0504a:117_7: na taṃ vuttaṃ nāma, yaṃ na sammā paṭiggahitaṃ. Bhagavato pana vacanaṃ catassopi parisā
atk-s0504a:117_8: sammadeva paṭiggahetvā tathattāya paṭipajjanti. Tasmā sammadeva paṭiggahitabhāvadassanatthampi
atk-s0504a:118_0: Atha vā ariyehi aviruddhavacanabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0504a:118_1: hi bhagavā kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjabhede dhamme pavattinivattiyo sammutiparamatthe
atk-s0504a:118_2: ca avisaṃvādento vadati, evaṃ dhammasenāpatippabhutayo ariyāpi bhagavati dharamāne
atk-s0504a:118_3: parinibbute ca tasseva desanaṃ anugantvā vadanti, na tattha nānāvādatā. Tasmā vuttamarahatā
atk-s0504a:118_4: tato parabhāge arahatā ariyasaṅghenāpīti evaṃ ariyehi aviruddhavacanabhāvadassanatthampi evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:119_0: Atha vā purimehi sammāsambuddhehi vuttanayabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti
atk-s0504a:119_1: vuttaṃ. Satipi hi jātigottāyuppamāṇādivisese dasabalādiguṇehi viya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0504a:119_2: buddhānaṃ viseso natthi, aññamaññaṃ attanā ca te pubbenāparaṃ aviruddhameva vadanti.
atk-s0504a:119_3: Tasmā vuttañhetaṃ yathā buddhehi attanā ca pubbe, idānipi amhākaṃ bhagavatā tatheva
atk-s0504a:119_4: vuttaṃ arahatāti evaṃ purimabuddhehi attanā ca suttantaresu vuttanayabhāvadassanatthampi
atk-s0504a:119_5: dvikkhattuṃ “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tena buddhānaṃ desanāya sabbattha avirodho dīpito hoti.
atk-s0504a:120_0: Atha vā “vutta”nti yadetaṃ dutiyaṃ padaṃ, taṃ arahantavuttabhāvavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:120_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā arahatāpi vuttaṃ – “ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0504a:120_2: idāni vuccamānaṃ vacananti. Atha vā “vutta”nti yadetaṃ dutiyaṃ padaṃ, taṃ na vacanatthaṃ,
atk-s0504a:120_3: atha kho vapanatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ dasseti – “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā, tañca
atk-s0504a:120_4: kho na vuttamattaṃ, na kathitamattaṃ; atha kho veneyyānaṃ kusalamūlaṃ vapita”nti
atk-s0504a:120_5: attho. Atha vā yadetaṃ vuttanti dutiyaṃ padaṃ, taṃ vattanatthaṃ. Ayaṃ hissa attho
atk-s0504a:120_6: – vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā arahatā, tañca kho na vuttamattaṃ, apica tadatthajātaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:120_7: caritanti. Tena “yathā vādī bhagavā tathā kārī”ti dasseti. Atha vā vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0504a:121_0: Atha vā “vutta”nti saṅkhepakathāuddisanaṃ sandhāyāha, puna “vutta”nti vitthārakathānidassanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:121_1: Bhagavā hi saṅkhepato vitthārato ca dhammaṃ deseti. Atha vā bhagavato duruttavacanābhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:121_2: “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā”ti vatvā puna “vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Sabbadā ñāṇānugatavacīkammatāya
atk-s0504a:121_3: hi bhagavato savāsanapahīnasabbadosassa akkhalitabyappathassa kadācipi duruttaṃ nāma
atk-s0504a:121_4: natthi. Yathā keci loke satisammosena vā davā vā ravā vā kiñci vatvā atha paṭiladdhasaññā
atk-s0504a:121_5: pubbe vuttaṃ avuttaṃ vā karonti paṭisaṅkharonti vā, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana
atk-s0504a:121_6: niccakālaṃ samāhito. Asammosadhammo asammohadhammo ca sabbaññutaññāṇasamupabyūḷhāya
atk-s0504a:121_9: amatavassaṃ vassanto viya sotabbasāraṃ savanānuttariyaṃ catusaccaṃ pakāsento karavīkarutamañjunā
atk-s0504a:121_10: sarena sabhāvaniruttiyā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vacanaṃ vadati, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
atk-s0504a:121_11: avakkhalitaṃ, kuto pana duruttāvakāso. Tasmā “yaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttameva,
atk-s0504a:121_12: na avuttaṃ duruttaṃ vā kadāci hotī”ti dassanatthaṃ – “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā”ti vatvā
atk-s0504a:121_13: puna – “vuttamarahatā”ti vuttanti na ettha punaruttidosoti. Evamettha punaruttasaddassa
atk-s0504a:122_0: Iti me sutanti ettha itīti ayaṃ itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadatthavipariyāyapakāranidassanāvadhāraṇādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0504a:122_1: Tathā hesa – “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpanti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
atk-s0504a:122_2: “Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
atk-s0504a:122_3: anukampā – kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane.
atk-s0504a:122_4: “Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe. “Māgaṇḍiyoti vā tassa
atk-s0504a:122_5: brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ
atk-s0504a:122_6: abhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo
atk-s0504a:122_7: paṇḍito; saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito; saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo paṇḍito”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:122_8: pakāre. “Sabbamatthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, sabbaṃ natthīti kho, kaccāna,
atk-s0504a:122_9: ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:122_10: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā
atk-s0504a:122_11: jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe, sanniṭṭhāneti attho. Svāyamidha
atk-s0504a:123_0: Tattha pakāratthena itisaddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇamanekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:123_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0504a:123_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi iti me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0504a:124_1: ca visayādibhedena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā. Nayā vā pāḷigatiyo, tā ca paññattianupaññattiādivasena
atk-s0504a:124_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā. Tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:125_0: Āsayova ajjhāsayo, so ca sassatādibhedena apparajakkhatādibhedena ca anekavidho.
atk-s0504a:125_1: Attajjhāsayādiko eva vā aneko ajjhāsayo anekajjhāsayo. So samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu
atk-s0504a:127_0: Iddhiādesanānusāsanībhedena tesu ca ekekassa visayādibhedena vividhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ
atk-s0504a:127_1: vā pāṭihāriyaṃ etassāti vividhapāṭihāriyaṃ. Tattha paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato
atk-s0504a:127_2: paṭihāriyanti atthe sati bhagavato paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā, puthujjanānampi
atk-s0504a:127_3: vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0504a:127_4: Tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha pāṭihāriyanti vattuṃ. Yasmā pana mahākāruṇikassa
atk-s0504a:127_5: bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tasmā tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Atha
atk-s0504a:127_6: vā bhagavato sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi
atk-s0504a:127_7: diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā
atk-s0504a:127_8: apanītā honti. Paṭīti vā pacchāti attho. Tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena
atk-s0504a:127_9: pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ. Attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi
atk-s0504a:127_10: haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ. Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena
atk-s0504a:127_11: katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasantāne
atk-s0504a:127_12: upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti. Paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ, paṭihāriye
atk-s0504a:127_13: vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0504a:127_14: vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato, tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte,
atk-s0504a:128_1: vā dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā gambhīrā, anupacitasambhārehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo
atk-s0504a:128_2: dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhā ca. Tasmā tehi catūhi gambhīrabhāvehi yuttanti
atk-s0504a:129_0: Eko eva bhagavato dhammadesanāghoso ekasmiṃ khaṇe pavattamāno nānābhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:129_1: attano attano bhāsāvasena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gahaṇūpago hutvā atthādhigamāya hoti.
atk-s0504a:129_2: Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvoti sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:130: Nidassanatthena – “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento – “iti me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0504a:131_0: Avadhāraṇatthena – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0504a:131_1: yadidaṃ ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0504a:131_2: evaṃ bhagavatā, “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo
atk-s0504a:131_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0504a:131_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti – “iti me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0504a:131_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva, na aññathā, daṭṭhabba”nti. Aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā
atk-s0504a:131_6: sutākārato aññathā, na pana bhagavatā desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato
atk-s0504a:131_7: desanā, sā na sabbākārena sakkā viññātunti vuttovāyamattho. Sutākārāvirujjhanameva
atk-s0504a:131_8: hi dhāraṇabalaṃ. Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā.
atk-s0504a:131_9: Itarathā hi thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamatthoti vā āpajjeyyāti.
atk-s0504a:132_0: Me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa – “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0504a:132_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0504a:132_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana “mayā
atk-s0504a:132_3: suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0504a:133_0: Ettha ca yo paro na hoti, so attāti evaṃ vattabbe niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte sakasantāne
atk-s0504a:133_1: vattanato tividhopi me-saddo yadipi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānādivisesasaṅkhāto
atk-s0504a:133_2: panassa vijjatevāyaṃ atthabhedoti āha – “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:134_0: Sutanti ayaṃ suta-saddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanavissutakilinnūpacitānuyogasotaviññeyyasotadvārānusāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0504a:134_1: Kiñcāpi hi kiriyāvisesako upasaggo, jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ suta-saddo eva
atk-s0504a:134_2: taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggopi udāharīyati.
atk-s0504a:135_0: Tattha “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu vissutadhammassāti
atk-s0504a:135_1: attho. “Avassutā avassutassā”tiādīsu kilinnā kilinnassāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṃ
atk-s0504a:135_2: pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu jhānānuyuttāti
atk-s0504a:135_3: attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo sutasannicayo”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:135_5: vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vā attho. Me-saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “iti me sutaṃ, mayā
atk-s0504a:135_6: sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti attho. Mamāti atthe sati “iti mama sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0504a:136_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu yasmā sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena itisaddena savanakiriyājotakena
atk-s0504a:136_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Tasmā itīti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgipuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:136_2: Sabbānipi vākyāni evakāratthasahitāniyeva avadhāraṇaphalattā. Tena sutanti assavanabhāvappaṭikkhepato
atk-s0504a:136_3: anūnāviparītaggahaṇanidassanaṃ. Yathā hi sutaṃ sutamevāti vattabbataṃ arahati, taṃ
atk-s0504a:136_4: sammā sutaṃ anūnaggahaṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇañca hotīti. Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena
atk-s0504a:136_5: saddo atthaṃ vadatīti, yasmā sutanti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho, tasmā sutanti
atk-s0504a:136_6: assavanabhāvappaṭikkhepato anūnāviparītaggahaṇanidassanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – iti
atk-s0504a:136_7: me sutaṃ, na diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhuñāṇena sacchikataṃ, na aññathā vā upaladdhaṃ, apica
atk-s0504a:136_8: sutaṃva, tañca kho sammadevāti. Avadhāraṇatthe vā itisadde ayamatthayojanāti tadapekkhassa
atk-s0504a:136_10: ca veditabbā. Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:137_0: Tathā itīti sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇato
atk-s0504a:137_1: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ ākārattho itisaddoti katvā. Meti attappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:137_2: Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ yathāvuttāya viññāṇavīthiyā pariyattidhammārammaṇattā. Ayañhettha
atk-s0504a:137_3: saṅkhepo – nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā kāraṇabhūtāya mayā na
atk-s0504a:137_4: aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo sutoti.
atk-s0504a:138_0: Tathā itīti nidassitabbappakāsanaṃ nidassanattho iti-saddoti katvā nidassetabbassa
atk-s0504a:138_1: nidassitabbattābhāvābhāvato. Tasmā itisaddena sakalampi sutaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:138_2: Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Suta-saddena hi labbhamānā
atk-s0504a:138_3: savanakiriyā savanaviññāṇappabandhappaṭibaddhā, tattha ca puggalavohāro. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
atk-s0504a:138_4: dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi,
atk-s0504a:139_0: Tathā itīti yassa cittasantānassa nānārammaṇappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:139_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddeso ākārattho itisaddoti katvā. Itīti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti
atk-s0504a:139_2: dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattiākāraṃ upādāya paññāpetabbasabhāvattā. Meti kattuniddeso.
atk-s0504a:139_3: Sutanti visayaniddeso. Sotabbo hi dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena
atk-s0504a:139_4: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā nānappakārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattu
atk-s0504a:140_0: Atha vā itīti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutānañhi dhammānaṃ gahitākārassa nidassanassa
atk-s0504a:140_1: avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanabhāvena itisaddena tadākārādidhāraṇassa puggalavohārūpādānadhammabyāpārabhāvato
atk-s0504a:140_2: puggalakiccaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Puggalavādinopi
atk-s0504a:140_3: hi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā na hotīti. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0504a:140_4: Meti hi saddappavatti ekanteneva sattavisesavisayā, viññāṇakiccañca tattheva samodahitabbanti.
atk-s0504a:140_5: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0504a:141_0: Tathā itīti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Sabbassa hi
atk-s0504a:141_2: vijjamānādīsu chasveva paññattīsu avarodho, tasmā yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho,
atk-s0504a:141_3: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti. So rūpasaddādiko ruppanānubhavanādiko
atk-s0504a:141_4: ca paramatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjati. Yo pana itīti ca meti ca
atk-s0504a:141_6: nāma, kimettha taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ itīti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha. Sutanti
atk-s0504a:141_7: vijjamānapaññatti. Yañhi taṃ sotena upaladdhaṃ, taṃ paramatthato vijjamānanti.
atk-s0504a:142_0: Tathā itīti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādīnaṃ paccāmasanavasena.
atk-s0504a:142_1: Meti sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe karaṇādivisesavisiṭṭhe upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0504a:142_2: Sutanti diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite
atk-s0504a:142_3: saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro dutiyaṃ, tatiyanti ādiko viya paṭhamādiṃ nissāya
atk-s0504a:142_4: “yaṃ na diṭṭhamutaviññātanirapekkhaṃ, taṃ suta”nti viññeyyattā diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya
atk-s0504a:142_5: vattabbo hoti. Asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti.
atk-s0504a:143_0: Ettha ca itīti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti. Paṭividdhā hi atthassa pakāravisesā itīti
atk-s0504a:143_1: idha āyasmatā ānandena paccāmaṭṭhā, tenassa asammoho dīpito. Na hi sammūḷho nānappakārappaṭivedhasamattho
atk-s0504a:143_2: hoti, lobhappahānādivasena nānappakārā duppaṭividdhā ca suttatthā niddisīyanti. Sutanti
atk-s0504a:143_3: vacanena asammosaṃ dīpeti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:143_4: hoti, na so kālantare mayā sutanti paṭijānāti. Iccassa asammohena sammohābhāvena
atk-s0504a:143_5: paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi, tathā asammosena satisiddhi.
atk-s0504a:143_6: Tattha paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā byañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthatā. Byañjanānañhi paṭivijjhitabbo
atk-s0504a:143_7: ākāro nātigambhīro, yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:143_8: paññā tattha guṇībhūtā hoti paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā. Satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya
atk-s0504a:143_9: atthappaṭivedhasamatthatā. Atthassa hi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro gambhīroti paññāya byāpāro
atk-s0504a:143_10: adhiko, sati tattha guṇībhūtā hoti satiyā pubbaṅgamāti katvā. Tadubhayasamatthatāyogena
atk-s0504a:144_0: Aparo nayo – itīti vacanena yonisomanasikāraṃ dīpeti. Tena vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ
atk-s0504a:144_2: hi ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedho sambhavati. Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ
atk-s0504a:144_3: dīpeti, nidānapucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ na samādhānamantarena
atk-s0504a:144_4: sambhavati vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā
atk-s0504a:144_5: vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti vadati. Yonisomanasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ
atk-s0504a:144_6: pubbekatapuññatañca sādheti, sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:144_7: Avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca sādheti, assutavato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa
atk-s0504a:144_8: ca tadabhāvato. Na hi vikkhittacitto saddhammaṃ sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:145_0: Aparo nayo – “yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:145_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca so bhagavato vacanassa atthabyañjanappabhedaparicchedavasena
atk-s0504a:145_3: na sammā appaṇihitattano pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti, tasmā itīti iminā bhaddakena
atk-s0504a:145_4: ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti, sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ.
atk-s0504a:145_5: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa
atk-s0504a:145_6: pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā āsayasuddhi siddhā hoti, sammā paṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño
atk-s0504a:145_7: visuddhāsayo hoti, tadavisuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “sammā
atk-s0504a:145_8: paṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti “katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja,
atk-s0504a:145_9: khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti ca. Purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi. Patirūpadesavāsena
atk-s0504a:145_10: hi sappurisūpanissayena ca sādhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanenapi visuddhappayogo hoti.
atk-s0504a:145_11: Tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā adhigamabyattisiddhi, pubbe eva taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ visodhitattā
atk-s0504a:145_13: avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0504a:145_14: vacanaṃ aruṇuggamanaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato, yonisomanasikāro viya ca kusaladhammassa,
atk-s0504a:145_15: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento iti me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:146_0: Aparo nayo – itīti iminā pubbe vuttanayena nānappakārappaṭivedhadīpakena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:146_1: dīpeti. Sutanti iminā itisaddasannidhānato vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sotabbabhedappaṭivedhadīpakena
atk-s0504a:146_2: dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti. Itīti ca idaṃ vuttanayeneva yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ
atk-s0504a:146_3: vacanaṃ bhāsamāno “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:146_4: Pariyattidhammā hi “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:146_6: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ
atk-s0504a:146_7: rūpa”ntiādinā nayena suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā paṭividdhā attano paresañca hitasukhāvahā
atk-s0504a:146_8: hontīti. Suttanti idaṃ savanayogaparidīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “bahū mayā dhammā sutā
atk-s0504a:146_9: dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Sotāvadhānappaṭibaddhā hi pariyattidhammassa savanadhāraṇaparicayā.
atk-s0504a:146_10: Tadubhayenapi dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ
atk-s0504a:146_11: janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro
atk-s0504a:146_12: hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabbo.
atk-s0504a:147_0: Iti me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ
atk-s0504a:147_1: attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0504a:147_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0504a:147_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0504a:148_0: Apica iti me sutanti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0504a:148_1: sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0504a:148_4: Na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbāti sabbadevamanussānaṃ
atk-s0504a:148_5: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādeti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0504a:151_0: Etthāha – “kasmā panettha yathā aññesu suttesu ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā’tiādinā
atk-s0504a:151_1: kāladese apadisitvāva nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ, evaṃ na bhāsita”nti? Apare tāva āhu – na
atk-s0504a:151_2: pana therena bhāsitattā. Idañhi nidānaṃ na āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamaṃ bhāsitaṃ khujjuttarāya
atk-s0504a:151_3: pana bhagavatā upāsikāsu bahussutabhāvena etadagge ṭhapitāya sekkhappaṭisambhidāppattāya
atk-s0504a:151_4: ariyasāvikāya sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:152_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathā – ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma sammāsambuddho
atk-s0504a:152_1: loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko haṃsavatiyaṃ viharati. Athekadivasaṃ haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:152_2: ekā kuladhītā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ gacchantīhi upāsikāhi saddhiṃ ārāmaṃ gatā.
atk-s0504a:152_3: Satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ bahussutānaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikāraṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0504a:152_4: ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Satthāpi naṃ byākāsi “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0504a:152_5: sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ aggā bhavissatī”ti. Tassā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:152_6: devaloke nibbattitvā puna manussesūti evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantiyā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0504a:152_7: atikkantaṃ. Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sā devalokato cavitvā
atk-s0504a:152_8: ghosakaseṭṭhissa gehe dāsiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, uttarātissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:152_9: Sā jātakāle khujjā ahosīti khujjuttarātveva paññāyittha. Sā aparabhāge ghosakaseṭṭhinā
atk-s0504a:152_10: rañño utenassa sāmāvatiyā dinnakāle tassā paricārikabhāvena dinnā rañño utenassa antepure vasati.
atk-s0504a:153_1: uddissa tayo vihāre kāretvā janapadacārikaṃ carante tathāgate kosambinagaraṃ sampatte
atk-s0504a:153_2: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāre niyyādetvā mahādānāni pavattesuṃ, māsamattaṃ
atk-s0504a:153_3: atikkami. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi – “buddhā nāma sabbalokānukampakā, aññesampi okāsaṃ
atk-s0504a:153_4: dassāmā”ti kosambinagaravāsinopi janassa okāsaṃ akaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya nāgarā vīthisabhāgena
atk-s0504a:153_5: gaṇasabhāgena mahādānaṃ denti. Athekadivasaṃ satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mālākārajeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0504a:153_6: gehe nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe khujjuttarā sāmāvatiyā pupphāni gahetuṃ aṭṭha kahāpaṇe
atk-s0504a:153_7: ādāya taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi. Mālākārajeṭṭhako taṃ disvā “amma uttare, ajja tuyhaṃ pupphāni
atk-s0504a:153_8: dātuṃ khaṇo natthi, ahaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisāmi, tvampi parivesanāya
atk-s0504a:153_9: sahāyikā hohi, evaṃ ito paresaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇato muccissasī”ti āha. Tato khujjuttarā
atk-s0504a:153_10: buddhānaṃ bhattagge veyyāvaccaṃ akāsi. Sā satthārā upanisinnakathāvasena kathitaṃ
atk-s0504a:153_11: sabbameva dhammaṃ uggaṇhi, anumodanaṃ pana sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0504a:154_0: Sā aññesu divasesu cattārova kahāpaṇe datvā pupphāni gahetvā gacchati, tasmiṃ pana
atk-s0504a:154_1: divase diṭṭhasaccabhāvena parasantake cittaṃ anuppādetvā aṭṭhapi kahāpaṇe datvā pacchiṃ
atk-s0504a:154_2: pūretvā pupphāni gahetvā sāmāvatiyā santikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ sā pucchi “amma uttare,
atk-s0504a:154_3: tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na bahūni pupphāni āharasi, ajja pana bahukāni, kiṃ no rājā
atk-s0504a:154_4: uttaritaraṃ pasanno”ti? Sā musā vattuṃ abhabbatāya atīte attanā kataṃ anigūhitvā
atk-s0504a:154_5: sabbaṃ kathesi. Atha “kasmā ajja bahūni āharasī”ti ca vuttā “ajjāhaṃ sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0504a:154_6: dhammaṃ sutvā amataṃ sacchākāsiṃ, tasmā tumhe na vañcemī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā “are duṭṭhadāsi,
atk-s0504a:154_7: ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayā gahite kahāpaṇe dehī”ti atajjetvā pubbahetunā codiyamānā “amma,
atk-s0504a:154_8: tayā pītaṃ amataṃ, amhepi pāyehī”ti vatvā “tena hi maṃ nhāpehī”ti vutte soḷasahi
atk-s0504a:154_9: gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā dve maṭṭhasāṭake dāpesi. Sā ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0504a:154_10: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā āsane nisīditvā vicitrabījaniṃ ādāya nīcāsanesu nisinnāni pañca
atk-s0504a:154_11: mātugāmasatāni āmantetvā sekhappaṭisambhidāsu ṭhatvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva tāsaṃ
atk-s0504a:154_12: dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāvasāne tā sabbā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tā sabbāpi khujjuttaraṃ
atk-s0504a:154_13: vanditvā “amma, ajja paṭṭhāya tvaṃ kiliṭṭhakammaṃ mā kari, amhākaṃ mātuṭṭhāne ācariyaṭṭhāne
atk-s0504a:155_0: Kasmā panesā dāsī hutvā nibbattāti? Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:155_1: seṭṭhidhītā hutvā nibbattā. Ekāya khīṇāsavattheriyā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gatāya “etaṃ me
atk-s0504a:155_2: ayye, pasādhanapeḷikaṃ dethā”ti veyyāvaccaṃ kāresi. Therīpi “adentiyā mayi āghātaṃ
atk-s0504a:155_3: uppādetvā niraye nibbattissati, dentiyā paresaṃ dāsī hutvā nibbattissati, nirayasantāpato
atk-s0504a:155_4: dāsibhāvo seyyo”ti anuddayaṃ paṭicca tassā vacanaṃ akāsi. Sā tena kammena pañca jātisatāni
atk-s0504a:156_0: Kasmā pana khujjā ahosi? Anuppanne kira buddhe ayaṃ bārāṇasirañño gehe vasantī ekaṃ
atk-s0504a:156_1: rājakulūpakaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ thokaṃ khujjadhātukaṃ disvā attanā sahavāsīnaṃ mātugāmānaṃ
atk-s0504a:156_2: purato parihāsaṃ karontī yathāvajjaṃ keḷivasena khujjākāraṃ dassesi, tasmā khujjā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0504a:157_0: Kiṃ pana katvā paññavantī jātāti? Anuppanne kira buddhe ayaṃ bārāṇasirañño gehe vasantī
atk-s0504a:157_1: aṭṭha paccekabuddhe rājagehato uṇhapāyāsassa pūrite patte parivattitvā parivattitvā
atk-s0504a:157_2: gaṇhante disvā attano santakāni aṭṭha dantavalayāni “idha ṭhapetvā gaṇhathā”ti adāsi.
atk-s0504a:157_3: Te tathā katvā olokesuṃ. “Tumhākaññeva tāni pariccattāni, gahetvā gacchathā”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:157_4: Te nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamaṃsu. Ajjāpi tāni valayāni arogāneva. Sā tassa nissandena paññavantī jātā.
atk-s0504a:158_0: Atha naṃ sāmāvatippamukhāni pañca itthisatāni “amma, tvaṃ divase divase satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0504a:158_1: gantvā bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā amhākaṃ desehī”ti vadiṃsu. Sā tathā karontī
atk-s0504a:158_2: aparabhāge tipiṭakadharā jātā. Tasmā naṃ satthā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ
atk-s0504a:158_3: bahussutānaṃ upāsikānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Iti upāsikāsu bahussutabhāvena
atk-s0504a:158_4: satthārā etadagge ṭhapitā paṭisambhidāppattā khujjuttarā ariyasāvikā satthari kosambiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:158_5: viharante kālena kālaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā antepuraṃ gantvā sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:158_6: pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ ariyasāvikānaṃ satthārā desitaniyāmena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:158_7: kathentī attānaṃ parimocetvā satthu santike sutabhāvaṃ pakāsentī “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:159_0: Yasmā pana tasmiṃyeva nagare bhagavato sammukhā sutvā tadaheva tāya tāsaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:159_1: tasmā “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharatī”ti kāladesaṃ apadisituṃ payojanasambhavova
atk-s0504a:159_2: natthi supākaṭabhāvato. Bhikkhuniyo cassā santike imāni suttāni gaṇhiṃsu. Evaṃ paramparāya
atk-s0504a:159_3: bhikkhūsupi tāya āropitaṃ nidānaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Atha āyasmā ānando tathāgatassa
atk-s0504a:159_4: parinibbānato aparabhāge sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ ajātasattunā kārāpite saddhammamaṇḍape
atk-s0504a:159_5: mahākassapappamukhassa vasīgaṇassa majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyanto imesaṃ suttānaṃ
atk-s0504a:159_6: nidānassa dveḷhakaṃ pariharanto tāya āropitaniyāmeneva nidānaṃ āropesīti.
atk-s0504a:160_0: Keci panettha bahuppakāre papañcenti. Kiṃ tehi? Apica nānānayehi saṅgītikārā dhammavinayaṃ
atk-s0504a:160_1: saṅgāyiṃsu. Anubuddhā hi dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherā, te sammadeva dhammavinayassa saṅgāyanākāraṃ
atk-s0504a:160_2: jānantā katthaci “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā, katthaci “tena samayenā”tiādinā, katthaci
atk-s0504a:160_3: gāthābandhavasena nidānaṃ ṭhapentā, katthaci sabbena sabbaṃ nidānaṃ aṭṭhapentā vaggasaṅgahādivasena
atk-s0504a:160_4: dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyiṃsu. Tattha idha vuttañhetantiādinā nidānaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgāyiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:160_5: kiñci suttageyyādivasena navaṅgamidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ sabbesampi
atk-s0504a:160_6: sammāsambuddhānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “appakañca nesaṃ ahosi suttaṃ geyya”ntiādi. Tattha
atk-s0504a:160_7: itivuttakaṅgassa aññaṃ kiñci na paññāyati tabbhāvanimittaṃ ṭhapetvā “vuttañhetaṃ…pe…
atk-s0504a:160_8: me suta”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti ādinayappavattā
atk-s0504a:160_9: dvādasuttarasatasuttantā itivuttaka”nti. Tasmā satthu adhippāyaṃ jānantehi dhammasaṅgāhakehi
atk-s0504a:160_10: ariyasāvikāya vā imesaṃ suttānaṃ itivuttakaṅgabhāvañāpanatthaṃ imināva nayena nidānaṃ
atk-s0504a:161_0: Kimatthaṃ pana dhammavinayasaṅgahe kayiramāne nidānavacanaṃ? Nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva
atk-s0504a:161_2: Kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā
atk-s0504a:161_3: saddheyyā ca desakālakattuhetunimittehi upanibaddho viya vohāravinicchayo. Teneva
atk-s0504a:161_4: ca āyasmatā mahākassapena brahmajālamūlapariyāyasuttādīnaṃ desādipucchāsu katāsu
atk-s0504a:161_5: tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:161_6: Idha pana desakālassa aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
atk-s0504a:162_0: Apica satthu sampattippakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
atk-s0504a:162_1: sammāsambuddhabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi sabbattha
atk-s0504a:162_3: khīṇāsavabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhassa parānuggahapavatti.
atk-s0504a:162_7: bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā
atk-s0504a:162_8: hoti, tattha tattha sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato.
atk-s0504a:162_9: Idha pana anavasesato kāmadosappahānaṃ vidhāya desanādīpanato cāti yojetabbaṃ. Tena
atk-s0504a:162_10: vuttaṃ “satthu sampattippakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacana”nti. Ettha ca “bhagavatā arahatā”ti
atk-s0504a:162_11: imehi padehi yathāvuttaatthavibhāvanatā heṭṭhā dassitā eva.
atk-s0504a:163_1: hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti attahitā vā. Tasmā paresaṃyevatthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa
atk-s0504a:163_2: sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0504a:163_3: yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanatthena sāsanaṃ, na kabbaracanā. Tayidaṃ satthu caritaṃ
atk-s0504a:163_4: kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsiyati.
atk-s0504a:163_5: Idha pana desakaparisāpadesehīti yojetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “sāsanasampattippakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacana”nti.
atk-s0504a:164_0: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:164_1: Tañcassa pamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavatā arahatā”ti imehi
atk-s0504a:164_2: padehi vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ. Idamettha nidānavacanappayojanassa mukhamattanidassananti.
atk-s0504a:169_0: 1. Idāni ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahathātiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa
atk-s0504a:169_1: vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. Sā panesā atthavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā
atk-s0504a:169_2: vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepaṃ tāva vicāressāma. Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā
atk-s0504a:169_3: – attajjhāsayo, parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasiko, aṭṭhuppattikoti. Yathā hi anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi
atk-s0504a:169_4: suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipaṭṭhānanayena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti, evaṃ attajjhāsayādisuttanikkhepavasena
atk-s0504a:169_5: catubbidhataṃ nātivattantīti. Tattha yathā attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāvasikehi
atk-s0504a:169_6: saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca, attajjhāsayo ca
atk-s0504a:169_7: pucchāvasiko ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca pucchāvasiko
atk-s0504a:169_8: cāti ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisambhavato; evaṃ yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā attajjhāsayenapi
atk-s0504a:169_9: saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati, attajjhāsayādīhi pana purato ṭhitehi aṭṭhuppattiyā saṃsaggo
atk-s0504a:169_10: natthīti niravaseso paṭṭhānanayo na sambhavati. Tadantogadhattā vā sambhavantānaṃ
atk-s0504a:169_11: sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattāro suttanikkhepā vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:170_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – nikkhipīyatīti nikkhepo, suttaṃ eva nikkhepo suttanikkhepo.
atk-s0504a:170_1: Atha vā nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho.
atk-s0504a:170_2: Attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, so assa atthi kāraṇabhūtoti attajjhāsayo, attano ajjhāsayo
atk-s0504a:170_3: etassāti vā attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayepi eseva nayo. Pucchāya vasoti pucchāvaso.
atk-s0504a:170_4: So etassa atthīti pucchāvasiko. Suttadesanāya vatthubhūtassa atthassa uppatti atthuppatti,
atk-s0504a:170_5: atthuppatti eva aṭṭhuppatti tha-kārassa ṭha-kāraṃ katvā, sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko.
atk-s0504a:170_6: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti nikkhepo, attajjhāsayādi eva. Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe
atk-s0504a:170_7: attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo. Paresaṃ ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo. Pucchīyatīti pucchā,
atk-s0504a:170_8: pucchitabbo attho, pucchāvasena pavattaṃ dhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasaṃ,
atk-s0504a:170_9: tadeva nikkhepasaddāpekkhāya pucchāvasikoti pulliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Tathā aṭṭhuppatti
atk-s0504a:171_0: Apica paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo
atk-s0504a:171_1: yutto, kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ pavattitadesanattā. Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ
atk-s0504a:171_2: pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ
atk-s0504a:171_3: kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho, pucchāvasikaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena
atk-s0504a:171_4: pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti? Na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva
atk-s0504a:171_6: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi brahmajāladhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ
atk-s0504a:171_7: aṭṭhuppatti vuccati. Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
atk-s0504a:172: Yāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva katheti, seyyathidaṃ – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ, tuvaṭṭakasuttantievamādīni, tesaṃ attajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0504a:173_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ
atk-s0504a:173_1: uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca
atk-s0504a:173_2: oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ – rāhulovādasuttaṃ, dhammacakkappavattanasuttantievamādīni,
atk-s0504a:174_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā devā manussā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā ca tathā
atk-s0504a:174_1: tathā pañhaṃ pucchanti “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgāti, bhante, vuccanti, nīvaraṇā nīvaraṇāti
atk-s0504a:174_2: vuccantī”tiādinā, evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:175: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ – dhammadāyādaṃ, puttamaṃsūpamaṃ, dārukkhandhūpamantievamādīni, tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0504a:176_0: Evamimesu catūsu suttanikkhepesu imassa suttassa parajjhāsayo nikkhepo. Parajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0504a:176_1: hetaṃ nikkhittaṃ. Kesaṃ ajjhāsayena? Lobhe ādīnavadassīnaṃ puggalānaṃ. Keci pana
atk-s0504a:177_0: Tattha ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhavetiādīsu ekasaddo attheva aññatthe “sassato attā ca loko
atk-s0504a:177_1: ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu. Atthi seṭṭhe “cetaso
atk-s0504a:177_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu. Atthi asahāye “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu. Atthi saṅkhāyaṃ “ekova
atk-s0504a:177_3: kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu. Idhāpi saṅkhāyameva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:178_1: Tathā hissa “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pariyatti attho. “Diṭṭhadhammo”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:178_2: saccāni. “Evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu samādhi. “Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo,
atk-s0504a:178_3: save pecca na socatī”tiādīsu paññā. “Jātidhammānaṃ, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ evaṃ icchā
atk-s0504a:178_4: uppajjatī”tiādīsu pakati. “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri”ntiādīsu puññaṃ. “Tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:178_5: dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyya pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:178_6: āpatti. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādīsu suññatā. “Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena
atk-s0504a:178_7: buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyyo. “Kusalā dhammā akusalā
atk-s0504a:178_8: dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāvo attho. Idhāpi sabhāvo. Tasmā ekadhammanti ekaṃ saṃkilesasabhāvanti
atk-s0504a:178_9: adhippāyo. Eko ca so dhammo cāti ekadhammo, taṃ ekadhammaṃ.
atk-s0504a:179_0: Bhikkhaveti bhikkhū ālapati. Kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento bhikkhū ālapati,
atk-s0504a:179_1: na dhammameva desetīti? Satijananatthaṃ. Bhikkhū hi aññaṃ cintentāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi
atk-s0504a:179_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontāpi nisinnā honti. Te paṭhamaṃ anālapitvā dhamme desiyamāne
atk-s0504a:179_3: “ayaṃ desanā kiṃnidānā, kiṃpaccayā”ti sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti. Ālapite pana satiṃ
atk-s0504a:179_4: upaṭṭhapetvā sallakkhetuṃ sakkonti, tasmā satijananatthaṃ “bhikkhave”ti ālapati.
atk-s0504a:179_5: Tena ca tesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ vuttiṃ
atk-s0504a:179_7: vacanena te attano mukhābhimukhe karonto tena ca kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena
atk-s0504a:179_8: nesaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti. Teneva ca sambodhanatthena sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārepi
atk-s0504a:180_0: Aññesupi devamanussesu parisapariyāpannesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhū eva āmantesīti?
atk-s0504a:180_2: parisāya ca jeṭṭhā bhikkhū paṭhamuppannattā, seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthu
atk-s0504a:180_3: cariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca, āsannā tattha nisinnesu samīpavuttiyā,
atk-s0504a:180_4: sadāsannihitā satthusantikāvacarattā. Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:180_5: paṭipattisabbhāvato, visesato ca ekacce bhikkhū sandhāya ayaṃ desanāti te eva ālapi.
atk-s0504a:181_0: Pajahathāti ettha pahānaṃ nāma tadaṅgappahānaṃ, vikkhambhanappahānaṃ, samucchedappahānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:181_1: paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ, nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha yaṃ dīpālokeneva
atk-s0504a:181_3: tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – pariccāgena lobhādimalassa, sīlena
atk-s0504a:181_7: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0504a:181_8: bhayadassanena sabhayesu abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanena
atk-s0504a:181_10: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyā, nibbānena paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa
atk-s0504a:182_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe
atk-s0504a:182_1: sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:182_2: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:182_3: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
atk-s0504a:182_4: samucchindanaṃ, idaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ
atk-s0504a:182_5: kilesānaṃ, etaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0504a:182_6: nibbānaṃ, etaṃ nissaraṇappahānaṃ nāma. Evaṃ pañcavidhe pahāne anāgāmikabhāvakarassa
atk-s0504a:182_7: pahānassa adhippetattā idha samucchedappahānanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā pajahathāti pariccajatha,
atk-s0504a:183_0: Ahanti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisati. Voti ayaṃ vosaddo paccattaupayogakaraṇasāmivacanapadapūraṇasampadānesu
atk-s0504a:183_1: dissati. Tathā hi “kacci, pana vo anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu paccatte
atk-s0504a:183_2: āgato. “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo”tiādīsu upayoge. “Na vo mama santike vatthabba”ntiādīsu
atk-s0504a:183_3: karaṇe. “Sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputta, subhāsita”ntiādīsu sāmivacane. “Ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:183_4: padapūraṇe. “Vanapatthapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādīsu sampadāne. Idhāpi
atk-s0504a:184_0: Pāṭibhogoti paṭibhū. So hi dhāraṇakaṃ paṭicca dhanikassa, dhanikaṃ paṭicca dhāraṇakassa
atk-s0504a:184_1: paṭinidhibhūto dhanikasantakassa tato haraṇādisaṅkhātena bhuñjanena bhogoti paṭibhogo,
atk-s0504a:184_2: paṭibhogo eva pāṭibhogo. Anāgāmitāyāti anāgāmibhāvatthāya. Paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:184_3: hi kāmabhavassa anāgamanato anāgāmī. Yo yassa dhammassa adhigamena anāgāmīti vuccati,
atk-s0504a:184_4: saphalo so tatiyamaggo anāgāmitā nāma. Iti bhagavā veneyyadamanakusalo veneyyajjhāsayānukūlaṃ
atk-s0504a:184_5: tatiyamaggādhigamaṃ lahunā upāyena ekadhammapūraṇatāmattena thiraṃ katvā dassesi
atk-s0504a:184_6: yathā taṃ sammāsambuddho. Bhinnabhūmikāpi hi paṭighasaṃyojanādayo tatiyamaggavajjhā
atk-s0504a:185_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā attānaṃ pāṭibhogabhāve ṭhapesi? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāgāmimaggādhigamāya
atk-s0504a:185_1: ussāhajananatthaṃ. Passati hi bhagavā “mayā ‘ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahatha, ahaṃ
atk-s0504a:185_2: vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā’ti vutte ime bhikkhū addhā taṃ ekadhammaṃ pahāya sakkā tatiyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0504a:185_3: samadhigantuṃ, yato dhammassāmi paṭhamamāha ‘ahaṃ pāṭibhogo’ti ussāhajātā tadatthāya
atk-s0504a:185_4: paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti. Tasmā ussāhajananatthaṃ anāgāmitāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0504a:186_0: Katamaṃ ekadhammanti ettha katamanti pucchāvacanaṃ. Pucchā ca nāmesā pañcavidhā –
atk-s0504a:186_2: kathetukamyatāpucchāti. Tattha pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ
atk-s0504a:186_3: atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ, tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya
atk-s0504a:186_4: vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati, ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā. Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ
atk-s0504a:186_5: hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya
atk-s0504a:186_6: pañhaṃ pucchati, ayaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā. Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando
atk-s0504a:186_7: dveḷhakajāto – “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti, so vimaticchedanatthāya
atk-s0504a:186_8: pañhaṃ pucchati, ayaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchā. Bhagavā hi anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0504a:186_9: pucchati – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”tiādinā, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:186_10: anumatipucchā. Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṃ pucchati – “cattārome,
atk-s0504a:186_11: bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāya. Katame
atk-s0504a:187_0: Tattha purimā tisso pucchā buddhānaṃ natthi. Kasmā? Tīsu hi addhāsu kiñci saṅkhataṃ
atk-s0504a:187_1: addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:187_2: avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi. Tena nesaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā natthi. Yaṃ pana tehi attano
atk-s0504a:187_3: ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ, tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā
atk-s0504a:187_4: vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi, tena nesaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchāpi natthi. Yasmā
atk-s0504a:187_5: pana buddhā bhagavanto akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikicchā sabbadhammesu vigatasaṃsayā,
atk-s0504a:187_6: tena nesaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchāpi natthi. Itarā pana dve pucchā atthi, tāsu ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:188_0: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhamatthaṃ sarūpato dassento “lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhamma”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:188_1: Tattha lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:188_2: ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle pakkhittamaṃsapesi
atk-s0504a:188_3: viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno telañjanarāgo viya, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno,
atk-s0504a:188_4: taṇhānadibhāvena vaḍḍhamāno yattha samuppanno, sīghasotā nadī viya mahāsamuddaṃ apāyameva
atk-s0504a:188_5: taṃ sattaṃ gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ lobhasaddo sabbalobhasāmaññavacano,
atk-s0504a:188_6: idha pana kāmarāgavacanoti veditabbo. So hi anāgāmimaggavajjho.
atk-s0504a:189_0: Puna bhikkhaveti ālapanaṃ dhammassa paṭiggāhakabhāvena abhimukhībhūtānaṃ tattha ādarajananatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:189_1: Pajahathāti iminā pahānābhisamayo vihito, so ca pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayehi
atk-s0504a:189_2: saddhiṃ eva pavattati, na visunti catusaccādhiṭṭhānāni cattāripi sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccāni
atk-s0504a:189_3: vihitāneva honti. Yathā ca “lobhaṃ pajahathā”ti vutte pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato dosādīnampi
atk-s0504a:189_4: pahānaṃ atthato vuttameva hoti, evaṃ samudayasaccavisaye sammādiṭṭhikicce pahānābhisamaye
atk-s0504a:189_5: vutte tassā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtānaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ sesamaggaṅgānampi samudayasaccavisayakiccaṃ
atk-s0504a:189_6: atthato vuttameva hotīti paripuṇṇo ariyamaggabyāpāro idha kathitoti daṭṭhabbo. Iminā
atk-s0504a:189_7: nayena satipaṭṭhānādīnampi bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ byāpārassa idha vuttabhāvo yathārahaṃ vitthāretabbo.
atk-s0504a:190_0: Apicettha lobhaṃ pajahathāti etena pahānapariññā vuttā. Sā ca tīraṇapariññādhiṭṭhānā,
atk-s0504a:190_1: tīraṇapariññā ca ñātapariññādhiṭṭhānāti avinābhāvena tissopi pariññā bodhitā honti.
atk-s0504a:190_2: Evamettha saha phalena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pakāsitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:190_3: Atha vā lobhaṃ pajahathāti saha phalena ñāṇadassanavisuddhi desitā. Sā ca paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhisannissayā…pe…
atk-s0504a:190_4: cittavisuddhisīlavisuddhisannissayā cāti nānantarikabhāvena saha phalena sabbāpi
atk-s0504a:194: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0504a:195: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ”. ;
atk-s0504a:196_0: Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇampi hanati, adinnampi ādiyati,
atk-s0504a:196_1: sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0504a:196_2: paradārampi gacchati, musāpi bhaṇati. Tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajānataṃ
atk-s0504a:201: “Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃkataṃ makkaṭakova jāla”nti. ca –
atk-s0504a:202: Evamādisuttapadānusārena nānānayehi lobhassa ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā tassa pahānāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:203_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmarāgassa pahānāya saṃvattanti, asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo,
atk-s0504a:203_1: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Dasavidhañhi
atk-s0504a:203_2: asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi kāmarāgo pahīyati, kāyagatāsatibhāvanāvasena saviññāṇake
atk-s0504a:203_4: indriyesu saṃvaraṇavasena satikavāṭena pihitadvārassāpi, catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā ālopānaṃ
atk-s0504a:203_5: okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi. Tenevāha –
atk-s0504a:206: Asubhakammaṭṭhānabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu dasaasubhanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tenevāha –
atk-s0504a:207: “Atthi, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṃ, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:208_0: Evaṃ pubbabhāge kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa lobhassa pahānāya paṭipanno vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0504a:208_1: tatiyamaggena taṃ anavasesato samucchindati. Tena vuttaṃ “lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:209_0: Etthāha “ko panettha lobho pahīyati, kiṃ atīto, atha anāgato, udāhu paccuppanno”ti?
atk-s0504a:209_1: Kiñcettha – na tāva atīto lobho pahīyeyya, na anāgato vā tesaṃ abhāvato. Na hi niruddhaṃ
atk-s0504a:209_2: anuppannaṃ vā atthīti vuccati, vāyāmo ca aphalo āpajjati. Atha paccuppanno, evampi
atk-s0504a:209_3: aphalo vāyāmo tassa sarasabhaṅgattā, saṃkiliṭṭhā ca maggabhāvanā āpajjati, cittavippayutto
atk-s0504a:209_4: vā lobho siyā, na cāyaṃ nayo icchitoti. Vuccate – na vuttanayena atītānāgatapaccuppanno
atk-s0504a:209_5: lobho pahīyati. Seyyathāpi idha taruṇarukkho asañjātaphalo, taṃ puriso kuṭhāriyā
atk-s0504a:209_6: mūle chindeyya, tassa rukkhassa chede asati yāni phalāni nibbatteyyuṃ, tāni rukkhassa
atk-s0504a:209_7: chinnattā ajātāni eva na jāyeyyuṃ, evameva ariyamaggādhigame asati uppajjanāraho
atk-s0504a:209_8: lobho ariyamaggādhigamena paccayaghātassa katattā na uppajjati. Ayañhi aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0504a:209_9: “bhūmiladdhuppanno”ti vuccati. Vipassanāya hi ārammaṇabhūtā pañcakkhandhā tassa uppajjanaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0504a:209_10: bhūmi nāma. Sā bhūmi tena laddhāti katvā bhūmiladdhuppanno. Ārammaṇādhiggahituppanno
atk-s0504a:210_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ sutte. Etanti etaṃ atthajātaṃ. Idāni gāthābandhavasena vuccamānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:210_1: Iti vuccatīti kena pana vuccati? Bhagavatā va. Aññesu hi tādisesu ṭhānesu saṅgītikārehi
atk-s0504a:210_2: upanibandhagāthā honti, idha pana bhagavatā va gāthārucikānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0504a:211_0: Tattha yena lobhena luddhāse, sattā gacchanti duggatinti yena ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇena
atk-s0504a:211_1: tato eva abhisaṅgarasena lobhena luddhā ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu giddhā gadhitā.
atk-s0504a:211_2: Seti hi nipātamattaṃ. Akkharacintakā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu se-kārāgamaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0504a:211_3: Tathā luddhattā eva kāyasucaritādīsu kiñci sucaritaṃ akatvā kāyaduccaritādīni ca
atk-s0504a:211_4: upacinitvā rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya sattāti laddhanāmā pāṇino dukkhassa nibbattiṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0504a:211_5: duggatīti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ nirayaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ pettivisayañca paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:212_0: Taṃ lobhaṃ sammadaññāya, pajahanti vipassinoti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ lobhaṃ sabhāvato samudayato
atk-s0504a:212_1: atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇatoti imehi ākārehi sammā aviparītaṃ hetunā
atk-s0504a:212_2: ñāyena aññāya ñātatīraṇapariññāsaṅkhātāya paññāya jānitvā rūpādike pañcupādānakkhandhe
atk-s0504a:212_3: aniccādīhi vividhehi ākārehi passanato vipassino avasiṭṭhakilese vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0504a:212_4: maggapaññāya samucchedappahānavasena pajahanti, na puna attano santāne uppajjituṃ
atk-s0504a:212_5: denti. Pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācananti evaṃ sahajekaṭṭhapahānekaṭṭhehi
atk-s0504a:212_6: avasiṭṭhakilesehi saddhiṃ taṃ lobhaṃ anāgāmimaggena pajahitvā puna pacchā imaṃ kāmadhātusaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:212_7: lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena kadācipi na āgacchanti orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0504a:212_8: suppahīnattā. Iti bhagavā anāgāmiphalena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0504a:213_0: Ayampi atthoti nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva gāthāpariyosānā iminā suttena pakāsito
atk-s0504a:213_1: attho. Api-saddo idāni vakkhamānasuttatthasampiṇḍano. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:213_2: sutte samudayasaccaṃ sarūpeneva āgataṃ, pahānāpadesena maggasaccaṃ. Itaraṃ saccadvayañca
atk-s0504a:213_3: tadubhayahetutāya niddhāretabbaṃ. Gāthāya pana dukkhasamudayamaggasaccāni yathārutavaseneva
atk-s0504a:213_4: ñāyanti, itaraṃ niddhāretabbaṃ. Eseva nayo ito paresupi suttesu.
atk-s0504a:217_0: 2. Vuttañhetaṃ …pe… dosanti dutiyasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Yathā ettha,
atk-s0504a:217_1: evaṃ ito paresupi sabbattha apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma. Yasmā idaṃ suttaṃ dosabahulānaṃ
atk-s0504a:217_2: puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dosavūpasamanatthaṃ desitaṃ, tasmā “dosaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:217_3: ekadhammaṃ pajahathā”ti āgataṃ. Tattha dosanti “anatthaṃ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:217_4: nayena sutte vuttānaṃ navannaṃ, “atthaṃ me nācarī”tiādīnañca tappaṭipakkhato siddhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:217_5: navannamevāti aṭṭhārasannaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādinā aṭṭhānena saddhiṃ ekūnavīsatiyā aññatarāghātavatthusambhavaṃ
atk-s0504a:217_6: āghātaṃ. So hi dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti dosoti
atk-s0504a:217_7: vuccati. So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano
atk-s0504a:217_8: nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto,
atk-s0504a:218_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0504a:218_1: Katame pañca? Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, mettā tasmiṃ puggale bhāvetabbā…pe…
atk-s0504a:218_2: karuṇā…pe… upekkhā, asatiamanasikāro tasmiṃ puggale āpajjitabbo, evaṃ tasmiṃ puggale
atk-s0504a:218_3: āghāto paṭivinetabbo. Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, kammassakatā tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:220_0: “Pañcime, āvuso, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0504a:220_1: Katame pañca? Idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti parisuddhavacīsamācāro;
atk-s0504a:221: Evamādināpi nayena pañca āghātapaṭivinayā vuttā, tesu yena kenaci āghātapaṭivinayavidhinā paccavekkhitvā. Apica yo –
atk-s0504a:222: “Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti satthu ovādo.
atk-s0504a:226: Paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati. ;
atk-s0504a:227_0: “Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ
atk-s0504a:227_1: vā purisaṃ vā. Katame satta? Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati, ‘aho
atk-s0504a:227_2: vatāyaṃ dubbaṇṇo assā’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya
atk-s0504a:227_3: nandati. Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kiñcāpi so
atk-s0504a:227_4: hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano, atha kho so dubbaṇṇova
atk-s0504a:227_5: hoti kodhābhibhūto. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ
atk-s0504a:228_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati ‘aho vatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ sayeyyā’ti…pe…
atk-s0504a:228_1: na pacurattho assāti…pe… na bhogavā assāti…pe… na yasavā assāti…pe… na mittavā assāti…pe…
atk-s0504a:228_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyāti. Taṃ kissa
atk-s0504a:228_3: hetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati. Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:228_4: purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ
atk-s0504a:228_5: carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati. So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ
atk-s0504a:228_6: caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto”ti.
atk-s0504a:229: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati…pe…. ;
atk-s0504a:232: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0504a:236_0: Evamādinā nayena dose ādīnave vuttappaṭipakkhato dosappahāne ānisaṃse ca paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:236_1: pubbabhāge dosaṃ tadaṅgappahānādivasena pajahitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena
atk-s0504a:236_2: sabbaso dosaṃ samucchindatha, pajahathāti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tattha niyojanaṃ. Tena
atk-s0504a:236_3: vuttaṃ “dosaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ pajahathā”ti. Duṭṭhāseti āghātena dūsitacittatāya
atk-s0504a:236_4: paduṭṭhā. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:239_0: 3. Tatiye mohanti aññāṇaṃ. Tañhi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe
atk-s0504a:239_1: aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇantiādinā nayena vibhāgena anekappabhedampi
atk-s0504a:239_2: muyhanti. Tena sayaṃ vā muyhati muyhanamattameva vā tanti mohoti vuccati. So cittassa
atk-s0504a:239_5: sabbākusalānaṃ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo. Idhāpi pajahathāti padassa –
atk-s0504a:240: “Mūḷho atthaṃ na jānāti, mūḷho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0504a:241: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ moho sahate naraṃ”. ;
atk-s0504a:246: “Mūḷho kho, brāhmaṇa, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavatī”ti ca –
atk-s0504a:247_0: Ādinā nayena “yo koci dhammo kāmacchandādisaṃkilesadhammehi nibbattetabbo, atthato
atk-s0504a:247_1: sabbo so mohahetuko”ti ca mohe ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato mohappahāne ānisaṃsañca paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:247_2: kāmacchandādippahānakkameneva pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena mohaṃ pajahantā tatiyamaggena
atk-s0504a:247_3: yathāvuttalobhadosekaṭṭhaṃ mohaṃ samucchedavasena pajahathāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Anāgāmimaggavajjho
atk-s0504a:247_4: eva hi moho idhādhippetoti. Mūḷhāseti kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjādibhede attano hitāhite
atk-s0504a:250_0: 4. Catutthe kodhanti dosaṃ. Doso eva hi kodhapariyāyena bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0504a:250_1: ajjhāsayavasena evaṃ vutto. Tasmā dutiyasutte vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:250_2: Apica kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho, āghātakaraṇaraso, cittassa byāpattibhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno,
atk-s0504a:250_3: cetaso pūtibhāvoti daṭṭhabboti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:253_0: 5. Pañcame makkhanti paraguṇamakkhanaṃ. Yadipi hi so gūthaṃ gahetvā paraṃ paharanto
atk-s0504a:253_1: viya attano karaṃ paṭhamataraṃ makkhatiyeva, tathāpi paresaṃ guṇamakkhanādhippāyena
atk-s0504a:253_2: pavattetabbattā “paraguṇamakkhano”ti vuccati. Tathā hi so udakapuñchanamiva nhātassa
atk-s0504a:253_3: sarīragataṃ udakaṃ paresaṃ guṇe makkheti puñchati vināseti, parehi vā katānaṃ mahantānampi
atk-s0504a:253_4: kārānaṃ khepanato dhaṃsanato makkhoti vuccati. So paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo, tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:253_5: vināsanaraso, tadavacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Atthato pana paresaṃ guṇamakkhanākārena
atk-s0504a:253_6: pavatto domanassasahagatacittuppādoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pajahathāti tattha vuttappabhedaṃ
atk-s0504a:253_7: dosaṃ, dose ca vuttanayaṃ ādīnavaṃ, pahāne cassa ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā pubbabhāge
atk-s0504a:253_8: tadaṅgādivasena pajahantā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena anavasesaṃ samucchindathāti
atk-s0504a:253_9: attho. Makkhāseti makkhitā makkhitaparaguṇā, paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhitāro, tato eva
atk-s0504a:256_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe mānanti jātiādivatthukaṃ cetaso unnamanaṃ. So hi “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:256_1: nayena maññanti tena, sayaṃ vā maññati, mānanaṃ sampaggahoti vā mānoti vuccati. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:256_2: seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnohamasmīti mānoti evaṃ tividho. Puna
atk-s0504a:256_3: seyyassa seyyohamasmīti māno, seyyassa sadiso, seyyassa hīno; sadisassa seyyo, sadisassa
atk-s0504a:256_4: sadiso, sadisassa hīno; hīnassa seyyo, hīnassa sadiso, hīnassa hīnohamasmīti mānoti
atk-s0504a:256_5: evaṃ navavidhopi unnatilakkhaṇo, ahaṃkāraraso, sampaggaharaso vā, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno,
atk-s0504a:256_6: ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vā, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno ummādo viyāti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:256_9: ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato niratimānatāya ānisaṃsañca paccavekkhitvā rājasabhaṃ anuppatto
atk-s0504a:256_10: caṇḍālo viya sabrahmacārīsu nīcacittataṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena
atk-s0504a:256_11: taṃ pajahantā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samucchindathāti attho. Anāgāmimaggavajjho
atk-s0504a:256_12: eva hi māno idhādhippeto. Mattāseti jātimadapurisamadādivasena mānena pamādāpattihetubhūtena
atk-s0504a:256_13: mattā attānaṃ paggahetvā carantā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:257_0: Imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu gāthāsu vā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā.
atk-s0504a:257_1: Tattha ye ime avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhāti upapattibhavavasena pañca
atk-s0504a:257_2: anāgāmino, tesu avihesu upapannā avihā nāma. Te antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī,
atk-s0504a:257_4: tathā atappā, sudassā, sudassino. Akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī parihāyati.
atk-s0504a:257_5: Tattha yo avihādīsu uppajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā arahattappattiyā kilesaparinibbānena
