atk-s0504a:1640_1: hatthehi pādehi caturaṅganadīsotasantaraṇavāyāmassa sadisatā pākaṭāyeva. Tathā nadīsotassa
atk-s0504a:1640_2: tīre ṭhitassa cakkhumato purisassa kāmādiṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ taritvā tassa paratīrabhūte
atk-s0504a:1640_3: nibbānathale ṭhitassa pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumato bhagavato sadisabhāvo. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1641_0: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – nadīsoto viya anuppabandhavasena pavattamāno taṇhāsoto,
atk-s0504a:1641_1: tena vuyhamāno puriso viya anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe paribbhamanato taṇhāsotena vuyhamāno
atk-s0504a:1641_2: satto, tassa tattha piyarūpasātarūpavatthusmiṃ abhiniveso viya imassa cakkhādīsu
atk-s0504a:1641_4: pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanasamūho, tamatthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā tassa nadīsotassa paratīre
atk-s0504a:1641_5: ṭhito cakkhumā puriso viya sakalaṃ saṃsārādīnavaṃ sabbañca ñeyyadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:1641_6: viditvā taṇhāsotassa paratīrabhūte nibbānathale ṭhito samantacakkhu bhagavā, tassa
atk-s0504a:1641_7: purisassa tasmiṃ nadiyā sotena vuyhamāne purise anukampāya rahadassa rahadādīnavassa
atk-s0504a:1641_8: ca ācikkhanaṃ viya taṇhāsotena vuyhamānassa sattassa mahākaruṇāya bhagavato taṇhādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:1641_9: tadādīnavassa ca vibhāvanā, tassa vacanaṃ asaddahitvā anusotagāmino tassa purisassa
atk-s0504a:1641_10: tasmiṃ rahade maraṇappattimaraṇamattadukkhappattiyo viya bhagavato vacanaṃ asampaṭicchantassa
atk-s0504a:1641_11: apāyuppatti, sugatiyaṃ dukkhuppatti ca, tassa pana vacanaṃ saddahitvā hatthehi ca
atk-s0504a:1641_12: pādehi ca vāyāmakaraṇaṃ viya tena ca vāyāmena paratīraṃ patvā sukhena yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1641_13: viya bhagavato vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā taṇhādīsu ādīnavaṃ passitvā taṇhāsotassa paṭisotapabbajjādinekkhammavasena
atk-s0504a:1641_14: vīriyārambho, āraddhavīriyassa ca teneva vīriyārambhena taṇhāsotātikkamanaṃ nibbānatīraṃ
atk-s0504a:1642_0: Gāthāsu sahāpi dukkhena jaheyya kāmeti jhānamaggādhigamatthaṃ samathavipassanānuyogaṃ
atk-s0504a:1642_1: karonto bhikkhu yadipi tesaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kicchena kasirena sampajjati, na
atk-s0504a:1642_2: sukhena vīthiṃ otarati pubbabhāgabhāvanāya kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, indriyānaṃ vā
atk-s0504a:1642_3: atikkhabhāvato. Tathā sati sahāpi dukkhena jaheyya kāme, paṭhamajjhānena vikkhambhento
atk-s0504a:1642_4: tatiyamaggena samucchindanto kilesakāme pajaheyya. Etena dukkhapaṭipade jhānamagge dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1643_0: Yogakkhemaṃ āyatiṃ patthayānoti anāgāmitaṃ arahattaṃ icchanto ākaṅkhamāno. Ayañhettha
atk-s0504a:1643_1: adhippāyo – yadipi etarahi kicchena kasirena jhānapurimamagge adhigacchāmi, ime pana
atk-s0504a:1643_2: nissāya upari arahattaṃ adhigantvā katakicco pahīnasabbadukkho bhavissāmīti sahāpi
atk-s0504a:1643_3: dukkhena jhānādīhi kāme pajaheyyāti. Atha vā yo kāmavitakkabahulo puggalo kalyāṇamittassa
atk-s0504a:1643_4: vasena pabbajjaṃ sīlavisodhanaṃ jhānādīnaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattiṃ vā paṭipajjanto kicchena
atk-s0504a:1643_5: kasirena assumukho rodamāno taṃ vitakkaṃ vikkhambheti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sahāpi
atk-s0504a:1643_6: dukkhena jaheyya kāme”ti. So hi kicchenapi kāme pajahanto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ
atk-s0504a:1643_7: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanto anukkamena arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya. Tena vuttaṃ “yogakkhemaṃ
atk-s0504a:1644_0: Sammappajānoti vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya sammadeva pajānanto. Suvimuttacittoti
atk-s0504a:1644_1: tassa ariyamaggādhigamassa anantaraṃ phalavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttacitto. Vimuttiyā
atk-s0504a:1644_2: phassaye tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ maggaphalādhigamanakāle vimuttiṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1644_3: phassaye phuseyya pāpuṇeyya adhigaccheyya sacchikareyya. Upayogatthe hi “vimuttiyā”ti
atk-s0504a:1644_4: idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Vimuttiyā vā ārammaṇabhūtāya tattha tattha taṃtaṃphalasamāpattikāle
atk-s0504a:1644_5: attano phalacittaṃ phassaye phuseyya pāpuṇeyya, nibbānogadhāya phalasamāpattiyā vihareyyāti
atk-s0504a:1644_6: attho. Sa vedagūti so vedasaṅkhātena maggañāṇena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ gatattā paṭividdhattā
atk-s0504a:1644_7: vedagū. Lokantagūti khandhalokassa pariyantaṃ gato. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0504a:1647_0: 110. Ekādasame caratoti gacchantassa, caṅkamantassa vā. Uppajjati kāmavitakko vāti
atk-s0504a:1647_1: vatthukāmesu avītarāgatāya tādise paccaye kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ce,
atk-s0504a:1647_2: yadi uppajjati. Byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vāti āghātanimittabyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0504a:1647_3: vā vitakko, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraviheṭhanavasena vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati
atk-s0504a:1647_4: ceti sambandho. Adhivāsetīti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kāmavitakkādiṃ yathāpaccayaṃ attano
atk-s0504a:1647_5: citte uppannaṃ “itipāyaṃ vitakko pāpako, itipi akusalo, itipi sāvajjo, so ca kho
atk-s0504a:1647_6: attabyābādhāyapi saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena paccavekkhaṇāya abhāvato adhivāseti attano
atk-s0504a:1647_7: cittaṃ āropetvā vāseti ce. Adhivāsentoyeva ca nappajahati tadaṅgādippahānavasena
atk-s0504a:1647_8: na paṭinissajjati, tato eva na vinodeti attano cittasantānato na nudati na nīharati,
atk-s0504a:1647_9: tathā avinodanato na byantīkaroti na vigatantaṃ karoti. Ātāpī pahitatto yathā tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:1647_10: antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi evaṃ karoti, ayaṃ pana tathā na karotīti
atk-s0504a:1647_11: attho. Tathābhūtova na anabhāvaṃ gameti anu anu abhāvaṃ na gameti. Na pajahati ce,
atk-s0504a:1647_12: na vinodeti cetiādinā ce-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1648_0: Caranti caranto. Evaṃbhūtoti evaṃ kāmavitakkādipāpavitakkehi samaṅgībhūto. Anātāpī
atk-s0504a:1648_1: anottāpīti kilesānaṃ ātāpanassa vīriyassa abhāvena anātāpī, pāputrāsaātāpanaparitāpanalakkhaṇassa
atk-s0504a:1648_2: ottappassa abhāvena anottāpī. Satataṃ samitanti sabbakālaṃ nirantaraṃ. Kusīto hīnavīriyoti
atk-s0504a:1648_3: kusalehi dhammehi parihāyitvā akusalapakkhe kucchitaṃ sīdanato kosajjasamannāgamena
atk-s0504a:1648_4: ca kusīto, sammappadhānavīriyābhāvena hīnavīriyo vīriyavirahitoti vuccati kathīyati.
atk-s0504a:1648_5: Ṭhitassāti gamanaṃ upacchinditvā tiṭṭhato. Sayanairiyāpathassa visesato kosajjapakkhikattā
atk-s0504a:1648_6: yathā taṃsamaṅgino vitakkā sambhavanti, taṃ dassetuṃ “jāgarassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1649_0: Sukkapakkhe tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nādhivāsetīti āraddhavīriyassāpi viharato anādimati
atk-s0504a:1649_1: saṃsāre cirakālabhāvitena tathārūpappaccayasamāyogena satisammosena vā kāmavitakkādi
atk-s0504a:1649_2: uppajjati ce, taṃ bhikkhu attano cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti ce, abbhantare na vāseti
atk-s0504a:1649_3: ceti attho. Anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti? Pajahati chaḍḍeti. Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakena?
atk-s0504a:1649_4: Na hi, apica kho taṃ vinodeti nudati nīharati. Kiṃ balībaddaṃ viya patodena? Na hi,
atk-s0504a:1649_5: atha kho naṃ byantīkaroti vigatantaṃ karoti. Yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso
atk-s0504a:1649_6: bhaṅgamattampi, tathā te karoti. Kathaṃ pana te tathā karoti? Anabhāvaṃ gameti anu
atk-s0504a:1649_7: anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vikkhambhanappahānena yathā suvikkhambhitā honti tathā ne karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:1650_0: Evaṃbhūtotiādīsu evaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ anadhivāsanena suvisuddhāsayo samāno tāya
atk-s0504a:1650_1: ca āsayasampattiyā tannimittāya ca payogasampattiyā parisuddhasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro
atk-s0504a:1650_2: bhojane mattaññū satisampajaññena samannāgato jāgariyaṃ anuyutto tadaṅgādivasena
atk-s0504a:1650_3: kilesānaṃ ātāpanalakkhaṇena vīriyena samannāgatattā ātāpī, sabbaso pāputrāsena samannāgatattā.
atk-s0504a:1650_4: Ottāpī satataṃ rattindivaṃ, samitaṃ nirantaraṃ samathavipassanābhāvanānuyogavasena
atk-s0504a:1651_0: Gāthāsu gehanissitanti ettha gehavāsīhi apariccattattā gehavāsīnaṃ sabhāvattā gehadhammattā
atk-s0504a:1651_1: vā gehaṃ vuccati vatthukāmo. Atha vā gehapaṭibaddhabhāvato kilesakāmānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhāvato
atk-s0504a:1651_2: taṃvatthukattā vā kāmavitakkādi gehanissitaṃ nāma. Kummaggaṃ paṭipannoti yasmā ariyamaggassa
atk-s0504a:1651_3: uppathabhāvato abhijjhādayo tadekaṭṭhadhammā ca kummaggo, tasmā kāmavitakkādibahulo
atk-s0504a:1651_4: puggalo kummaggaṃ paṭipanno nāma. Mohaneyyesu mucchitoti mohasaṃvattaniyesu rūpādīsu
atk-s0504a:1651_5: mucchito sammatto ajjhopanno. Sambodhinti ariyamaggañāṇaṃ. Phuṭṭhunti phusituṃ pattuṃ,
atk-s0504a:1651_6: so tādiso micchāsaṅkappagocaro abhabbo, na kadāci taṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1652_0: Vitakkaṃ samayitvānāti yathāvuttaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalehi vūpasametvā.
atk-s0504a:1652_1: Vitakkūpasame ratoti navannampi mahāvitakkānaṃ accantavūpasamabhūte arahatte nibbāne
atk-s0504a:1652_2: eva vā ajjhāsayena rato abhirato. Bhabbo so tādisoti so yathāvutto sammā paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0504a:1652_3: puggalo pubbabhāge samathavipassanābalena sabbavitakke yathārahaṃ tadaṅgādivasena
atk-s0504a:1652_4: vūpasametvā ṭhito, vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:1652_5: nibbānasaṅkhātañca anuttaraṃ sambodhiṃ phuṭṭhuṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbo samatthoti.
atk-s0504a:1655: 111. Dvādasame sampannasīlāti ettha tividhaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgīmadhuravasena. Tesu –
atk-s0504a:1657: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe”ti. –
atk-s0504a:1658_0: Ettha paripuṇṇattho sampannasaddo. “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto
atk-s0504a:1658_1: upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato”ti ettha samaṅgibhāvattho sampannasaddo.
atk-s0504a:1658_2: “Imissā, bhante, mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ – seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ
atk-s0504a:1658_3: anīlakaṃ, evamassāda”nti ettha madhurattho sampannasaddo. Idha pana paripuṇṇatthepi
atk-s0504a:1658_4: samaṅgibhāvepi vaṭṭati, tasmā sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā hutvātipi, sīlasamaṅgino
atk-s0504a:1659_0: Tattha “paripuṇṇasīlā”ti iminā atthena khettadosavigamena khettapāripūri viya paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1659_1: nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “khettadosavigamena khettapāripūri viya sīladosavigamena sīlapāripūri
atk-s0504a:1659_2: vuttā”ti. “Sīlasamaṅgino”ti iminā pana atthena sīlena samaṅgībhūtā samodhānagatā
atk-s0504a:1659_3: samannāgatā hutvā viharathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti
atk-s0504a:1659_4: sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsadassanena ca. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0504a:1659_5: visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Tattha “sampannasīlā”ti ettāvatā kira bhagavā
atk-s0504a:1659_7: ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Kimassa uttari karaṇīyanti evaṃ sampannasīlānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1659_8: viharataṃ tumhākaṃ kinti siyā uttari kātabbaṃ, paṭipajjitabbanti ceti attho.
atk-s0504a:1660_0: Evaṃ “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā”tiādinā sampādanūpāyena saddhiṃ sīlasampadāya
atk-s0504a:1660_1: bhikkhū niyojento anekapuggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā desanaṃ ārabhitvā idāni yasmā ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0504a:1660_2: pavattitāpi bhagavato desanā anekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāva hoti sabbasādhāraṇattā, tasmā
atk-s0504a:1660_3: taṃ ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānavasena dassento “carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1661_0: Tattha abhijjhāyati etāyāti abhijjhā, parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇassa lobhassetaṃ
atk-s0504a:1661_1: adhivacanaṃ. Byāpajjati pūtibhavati cittaṃ etenāti byāpādo, “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinayappavattassa
atk-s0504a:1661_3: kāmacchando? Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosāna”nti,
atk-s0504a:1661_4: tathā “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho
atk-s0504a:1661_5: akusalamūla”ntiādinā, “doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1661_6: virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassā”tiādinā ca vitthāro veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1661_7: Vigato hotīti ayañca abhijjhā, ayañca byāpādo vigato hoti apagato, pahīno hotīti
atk-s0504a:1661_8: attho. Ettāvatā kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa ca byāpādanīvaraṇassa ca pahānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:1662_0: Thinamiddhanti thinañceva middhañca. Tesu cittassa akammaññatā thinaṃ, ālasiyassetaṃ
atk-s0504a:1662_1: adhivacanaṃ, vedanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ akammaññatā middhaṃ, pacalāyikabhāvassetaṃ
atk-s0504a:1662_2: adhivacanaṃ. Ubhinnampi “tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? Yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā
atk-s0504a:1662_3: olīyanā sallīyanā. Tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho
atk-s0504a:1663_0: Uddhaccakukkuccanti uddhaccañceva kukkuccañca. Tattha uddhaccaṃ nāma cittassa uddhatākāro,
atk-s0504a:1663_1: kukkuccaṃ nāma akatakalyāṇassa katapāpassa tappaccayā vippaṭisāro. Ubhinnampi “tattha
atk-s0504a:1663_2: katamaṃ uddhaccaṃ? Yaṃ cittassa uddhaccaṃ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṃ cittassā”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:1663_3: vitthāro. “Akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ, akataṃ kusalaṃ, akataṃ bhīruttānaṃ; kataṃ pāpaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1663_4: kataṃ luddaṃ, kataṃ kibbisa”ntiādinā pavattiākāro veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1664_0: Vicikicchāti buddhādīsu saṃsayo. Tassā “satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati, nādhimuccati
atk-s0504a:1664_1: na sampasīdatī”tiādinā, “tattha katamā vicikicchā? Yā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1664_2: vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā
atk-s0504a:1664_3: apariyogāhanā chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho”tiādinā ca nayena vitthāro veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1665: Ettha ca abhijjhābyāpādādīnaṃ vigamavasena ca pahānavasena ca tesaṃ vikkhambhanameva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1666_0: “So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodheti.
atk-s0504a:1666_1: Byāpādapadosaṃ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati, byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodheti.
atk-s0504a:1666_2: Thinamiddhaṃ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā
atk-s0504a:1666_3: cittaṃ parisodheti. Uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṃ upasantacitto
atk-s0504a:1666_4: uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṃ parisodheti. Vicikicchaṃ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati
atk-s0504a:1666_5: akathaṃkathī kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchāya cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1667_0: Tattha yathā nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathañca nesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti?
atk-s0504a:1667_1: Kāmacchandassa tāva asubhanimitte yonisomanasikārena pahānaṃ hoti, subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārenassa
atk-s0504a:1668: “Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1669_0: Evaṃ subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena uppajjantassa kāmacchandassa tappaṭipakkhato
atk-s0504a:1669_1: asubhanimitte yonisomanasikārena pahānaṃ hoti. Tattha asubhanimittaṃ nāma asubhampi
atk-s0504a:1669_2: asubhārammaṇampi, yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro, pathamanasikāro, anicce
atk-s0504a:1669_3: aniccanti vā, dukkhe dukkhanti vā, anattani anattāti vā, asubhe asubhanti vā manasikāro.
atk-s0504a:1669_4: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando pahīyati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:1670: “Atthi, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṃ. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1671_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo,
atk-s0504a:1671_1: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Dasavidhañhi
atk-s0504a:1671_2: asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhantassapi kāmacchando pahīyati, bhāventassapi, indriyesu pihitadvārassapi
atk-s0504a:1671_3: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1674_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi kāmacchando pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0504a:1674_1: dasaasubhanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā kāmacchandassa
atk-s0504a:1675_0: Paṭighanimitte āyonisomanasikārena byāpādassa uppādo hoti. Tattha paṭighampi paṭighanimittaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1675_1: paṭighārammaṇampi paṭighanimittaṃ. Ayonisomanasikāro sabbattha ekalakkhaṇo eva. Taṃ
atk-s0504a:1675_2: tasmiṃ nimitte bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:1676: “Atthi, bhikkhave, paṭighanimittaṃ. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1677_0: Mettāya pana cetovimuttiyā yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tattha “mettā”ti vutte
atk-s0504a:1677_1: appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati, “cetovimuttī”ti pana appanāva. Yonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇova.
atk-s0504a:1677_2: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:1678: “Atthi, bhikkhave, mettācetovimutti. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1679_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – mettānimittassa uggaho, mettābhāvanā,
atk-s0504a:1679_2: Odhisakānodhisakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassapi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0504a:1679_3: odhiso anodhiso disāpharaṇavasena mettaṃ bhāventassapi byāpādo pahīyati, “tvaṃ etassa
atk-s0504a:1679_4: kuddho kiṃ karissasi, kimassa sīlādīni vināsetuṃ sakkhissasi nanu tvaṃ attano kammena
atk-s0504a:1679_5: āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi, parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccikaṅgāratattaayasalākagūthādīni
atk-s0504a:1679_6: gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatā viya hoti. Esopi tava kuddho kiṃ karissati, kiṃ te sīlādīni
atk-s0504a:1679_7: vināsetuṃ sakkhissati esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati, appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ
atk-s0504a:1679_8: viya, paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etasseva esa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0504a:1679_9: evaṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhayesaṃ kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi, paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:1679_10: paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassapi, assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi
atk-s0504a:1679_11: byāpādo pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu mettānissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1680_0: Aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikārena thinamiddhassa uppādo hoti. Arati nāma ukkaṇṭhitatā,
atk-s0504a:1680_1: tandī nāma kāyālasiyaṃ, vijambhitā nāma kāyavinamanā, bhattasammado nāma bhattamucchā
atk-s0504a:1680_2: bhattapariḷāho, cetaso līnattaṃ nāma cittassa līnākāro. Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0504a:1680_3: bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:1681_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso līnattaṃ. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
atk-s0504a:1681_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa
atk-s0504a:1682_0: Ārambhadhātuādīsu pana yonisomanasikārena thinamiddhassa pahānaṃ hoti. Ārambhadhātu
atk-s0504a:1682_1: nāma paṭhamārambhavīriyaṃ, nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavataraṃ,
atk-s0504a:1682_2: parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ. Imasmiṃ tippabhede
atk-s0504a:1682_3: vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1683_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu, parakkamadhātu. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
atk-s0504a:1683_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa anuppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1684_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti, atibhojane nimittaggāho – iriyāpathasamparivattanatā,
atk-s0504a:1684_2: bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī
atk-s0504a:1684_3: viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati, catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa
atk-s0504a:1684_4: bhikkhuno taṃ na hoti. Evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassapi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0504a:1684_5: Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, tato aññaṃ parivattentassapi, rattiṃ candālokaṃ
atk-s0504a:1684_6: dīpālokaṃ ukkālokaṃ divā sūriyālokaṃ manasikarontassapi, abbhokāse vasantassapi mahākassapattherasadise
atk-s0504a:1684_7: vigatathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0504a:1684_8: dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa
atk-s0504a:1685_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti. Avūpasamo nāma
atk-s0504a:1685_1: avūpasantākāro, atthato taṃ uddhaccakukkuccameva. Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ
atk-s0504a:1686_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso avūpasamo. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro
atk-s0504a:1686_1: anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1687: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1688: “Atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso vūpasamo. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa anuppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1689_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā,
atk-s0504a:1689_1: vinaye pakataññutā, vuḍḍhasevitā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Bāhusaccenapi hi
atk-s0504a:1689_2: ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassapi
atk-s0504a:1689_4: ciṇṇavasībhāvatāya pakataññunopi, vuḍḍhe mahallakatthere upasaṅkamantassapi, upālittherasadise
atk-s0504a:1689_5: vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0504a:1689_6: kappiyākappiyanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa
atk-s0504a:1690_0: Vicikicchāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti. Vicikicchāṭṭhāniyā
atk-s0504a:1690_1: dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva. Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0504a:1691_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1692: Kusalādidhammesu pana yonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1693_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā, sāvajjānavajjā dhammā, sevitabbāsevitabbā
atk-s0504a:1693_1: dhammā, hīnapaṇītā dhammā, kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
atk-s0504a:1693_2: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya anuppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1694_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye
atk-s0504a:1694_2: hi ekaṃ vā…pe… pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassapi vicikicchā
atk-s0504a:1694_3: pahīyati, tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha kusalādibhedesu dhammesu paripucchābahulassapi, vinaye
atk-s0504a:1694_4: ciṇṇavasībhāvassapi, tīsu ratanesu okappanīya, saddhāsaṅkhāta, adhimokkhabahulassapi,
atk-s0504a:1694_5: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0504a:1694_6: ṭhānanisajjādīsu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1695_0: Ettha ca yathāvuttehi tehi tehi dhammehi vikkhambhanavasena pahīnānaṃ imesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1695_1: kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa tāva arahattamaggena accantappahānaṃ hoti, tathā thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa
atk-s0504a:1695_2: uddhaccanīvaraṇassa ca. Byāpādanīvaraṇassa pana kukkuccanīvaraṇassa ca anāgāmimaggena,
atk-s0504a:1695_3: vicikicchānīvaraṇassa sotāpattimaggena accantappahānaṃ hoti. Tasmā tesaṃ tathā pahānāya
atk-s0504a:1695_4: upakāradhamme dassetuṃ “āraddhaṃ hoti vīriya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Idameva vā yathāvuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1695_5: abhijjhādīnaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ, yasmā hīnavīriyatāya kusītena, anupaṭṭhitassatitāya
atk-s0504a:1695_7: na kadācipi te sakkā nibbattetuṃ, pageva itaraṃ, tasmā yathā paṭipannassa so abhijjhādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:1695_8: vigamo pahānaṃ sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ “āraddhaṃ hoti vīriya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tassattho
atk-s0504a:1695_9: – tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānāya sabbesampi vā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ samucchindanatthāya
atk-s0504a:1695_10: vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ hoti, paggahitaṃ asithilappavattanti vuttaṃ hoti. Āraddhattā eva
atk-s0504a:1696_0: Upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhāti na kevalañca vīriyameva, satipi ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena
atk-s0504a:1696_1: upaṭṭhitā hoti, tathā upaṭṭhitattā eva ca cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ saraṇasamatthatāya
atk-s0504a:1696_2: asammuṭṭhā. Passaddhoti kāyacittadarathappassambhanena kāyopissa passaddho hoti.
atk-s0504a:1696_3: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopissa passaddho eva hoti, tasmā “nāmakāyo
atk-s0504a:1696_4: rūpakāyo”ti avisesetvā “passaddho kāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Asāraddhoti so ca passaddhattā
atk-s0504a:1696_5: eva asāraddho, vigatadarathoti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampissa
atk-s0504a:1696_6: sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti, samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1698: “Carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1700_0: Gāthāsu yataṃ careti yatamāno careyya, caṅkamanādivasena gamanaṃ kappentopi “anuppannānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1700_1: pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0504a:1700_2: vuttasammappadhānavīriyavasena yatanto ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
atk-s0504a:1700_3: kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ gamanaṃ kappeyyāti attho. Esa nayo
atk-s0504a:1700_4: sesesupi. Keci pana “yata”nti etassa saṃyatoti atthaṃ vadanti. Tiṭṭheti tiṭṭheyya
atk-s0504a:1700_5: ṭhānaṃ kappeyya. Accheti nisīdeyya. Sayeti nipajjeyya. Yatamenaṃ pasārayeti etaṃ
atk-s0504a:1700_6: pasāretabbaṃ hatthapādādiṃ yataṃ yatamāno yathāvuttavīriyasamaṅgīyeva hutvā pasāreyya,
atk-s0504a:1701_0: Idāni yathā paṭipajjanto yataṃ yatamāno nāma hoti, taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “uddha”ntiādi
atk-s0504a:1701_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha uddhanti upari. Tiriyanti tiriyato, puratthimadisādivasena samantato
atk-s0504a:1701_2: disābhāgesūti attho. Apācīnanti heṭṭhā. Yāvatā jagato gatīti yattakā sattasaṅkhārabhedassa
atk-s0504a:1701_3: lokassa pavatti, tattha sabbatthāti attho. Ettāvatā anavasesato sammasanañāṇassa
atk-s0504a:1701_4: visayaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. Samavekkhitāti sammā hetunā ñāyena avekkhitā, aniccādivasena
atk-s0504a:1701_5: vipassakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammānanti sattasuññānaṃ. Khandhānanti rūpādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0504a:1701_6: khandhānaṃ. Udayabbayanti udayañca vayañca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – upari tiriyaṃ adhoti
atk-s0504a:1701_7: tisaṅgahe sabbasmiṃ loke atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ sabbesaṃ
atk-s0504a:1701_9: udayaṃ, pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi vayañca samavekkhitā samanupassitā bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0504a:1702_2: bhāventaṃ ñāṇaparamparaṃ nibbattentaṃ. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, rattiñceva divā ca. Satanti
atk-s0504a:1702_3: catusampajaññena samannāgatāya satiyā satokāriṃ. Satataṃ pahitattoti sabbakālaṃ pahitatto
atk-s0504a:1702_4: nibbānaṃ paṭipesitattoti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ buddhādayo ariyā āhu ācikkhanti kathenti.
atk-s0504a:1705_0: 112. Terasame lokoti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, atthato purimaṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1705_1: idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbaṃ. Svāyaṃ sattaloko, saṅkhāraloko, okāsalokoti
atk-s0504a:1705_2: vibhāgato sarūpato ca heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Apica khandhalokādivasena ca anekavidho loko. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1706_1: sampattibhavaloko, sampattisambhavaloko, eko loko sabbe sattā ahāraṭṭhitikā, dve
atk-s0504a:1706_2: lokā nāmañca rūpañca, tayo lokā tisso vedanā, cattāro lokā cattāro āhārā, pañca lokā
atk-s0504a:1706_3: pañcupādānakkhandhā, cha lokā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo,
atk-s0504a:1706_4: aṭṭha lokā aṭṭha lokadhammā, nava lokā nava sattāvāsā, dasa lokā dasāyatanāni, dvādasa
atk-s0504a:1706_5: lokā dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti.
atk-s0504a:1707_0: Evamanekadhā vibhattopi loko pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu eva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0504a:1707_1: upādānakkhandhā ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ jātipi dukkhā …pe… saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhāpi
atk-s0504a:1707_2: dukkhāti. Tena vuttaṃ “atthato purimaṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ, idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
atk-s0504a:1707_3: veditabba”nti. Nanu ca lujjanapalujjanaṭṭho avisesena pañcasu khandhesu sambhavatīti?
atk-s0504a:1707_4: Saccaṃ sambhavati. Yaṃ pana na lujjatīti gahitaṃ, taṃ tathā na hoti, ekaṃseneva lujjati
atk-s0504a:1707_5: palujjatīti so lokoti upādānakkhandhesveva lokasaddo nirūḷhoti veditabbo. Tasmā lokoti
atk-s0504a:1708_0: Yadipi tathāgata-saddassa heṭṭhā tathāgatasutte nānānayehi vitthārato attho vibhatto,
atk-s0504a:1708_2: pariññeyyato”ti pubbe vuttavibhāgena vā avisesato tāva āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādibhedato
atk-s0504a:1708_3: kusalākusalādivibhāgato vaṭṭappamāṇasaṇṭhānādibhedato, visesato vā pana “ayaṃ sassatāsayo,
atk-s0504a:1708_5: ca abhivisiṭṭhena sayambhuñāṇena sammā aviparītaṃ yo yo attho yathā yathā bujjhitabbo,
atk-s0504a:1708_6: tathā tathā buddho ñāto attapaccakkho katoti abhisambuddho.
atk-s0504a:1709_0: Lokasmāti yathāvuttalokato. Visaṃyuttoti visaṃsaṭṭho, tappaṭibaddhānaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1709_1: sammadeva samucchinnattā tato vippamuttoti attho. Lokasamudayoti suttantanayena taṇhā,
atk-s0504a:1709_2: abhidhammanayena pana abhisaṅkhārehi saddhiṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. Pahīnoti bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0504a:1709_3: arahattamaggañāṇena samucchedappahānavasena savāsanaṃ pahīno. Lokanirodhoti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1709_4: Sacchikatoti attapaccakkho kato. Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho
atk-s0504a:1709_5: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. So hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1709_6: ariyehi paṭipajjīyati cāti lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1710: Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1711: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ, anaññathameta”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0504a:1712_0: Apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, tathaṃ gatoti tathāgato, gatoti ca avagato atīto
atk-s0504a:1712_1: patto paṭipannoti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya
atk-s0504a:1712_2: tathāya aviparītāya gato avagato, tasmā loko tathāgatena abhisambuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:1712_3: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya
atk-s0504a:1712_4: tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato
atk-s0504a:1712_5: paṭipannoti tathāgatoti. Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā bhagavato tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1713_0: Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhanavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha
atk-s0504a:1713_2: pana “catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ tathāgatasadda-buddhasaddānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1713_3: atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā ceva hi pāḷi pavattāti. Tattha diṭṭhanti
atk-s0504a:1713_4: rūpāyatanaṃ. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ. Mutanti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1713_6: vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. Anuvicaritaṃ
atk-s0504a:1713_7: manasāti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. Kassa pana anuvicaritaṃ manasāti? Sadevakassa…pe…
atk-s0504a:1713_8: sadevamanussāyāti sambandhanīyaṃ. Tattha saha devehīti sadevako, tassa sadevakassa.
atk-s0504a:1714_4: Evamettha tīhi padehi devamārabrahmehi saddhiṃ sattaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1715_0: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito, samārakavacanena chakāmāvacaradevaloko,
atk-s0504a:1715_2: avasesasattaloko gahito. Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbalokavisayassa
atk-s0504a:1715_3: bhagavato abhisambuddhabhāve pakāsite yesamevaṃ siyā “māro nāma mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro
atk-s0504a:1715_4: vasavattī, brahmā pana tatopi mahānubhāvataro dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0504a:1715_5: ālokaṃ pharati, uttamajjhānasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Puthū ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0504a:1715_6: iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno mahānubhāvā saṃvijjanti. Ayañca sattakāyo
atk-s0504a:1715_7: ananto aparimāṇo, kimetesaṃ sabbesaṃyeva visayo anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddho”ti?
atk-s0504a:1716_0: Porāṇā panāhu – “sadevakassā”ti devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ pariyādiyati, “samārakassā”ti
atk-s0504a:1716_1: mārena saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ, “sabrahmakassā”ti brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0504a:1716_2: sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto
atk-s0504a:1716_3: “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā”ti āha. Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi khandhattayaparicchinne
atk-s0504a:1717_0: Yasmā taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti iminā idaṃ dasseti – yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0504a:1717_1: imassa sadevakassa lokassa “nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1717_2: āgacchati, taṃ sabbaṃ “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano
atk-s0504a:1717_3: vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0504a:1717_4: lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa “bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo”tiādi saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1717_5: sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, “mūlagandho tacagandho”tiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre
atk-s0504a:1717_8: kāyadvāre āpāthamāgacchati, “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā
atk-s0504a:1717_9: sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1718_0: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1718_1: manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati, “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0504a:1718_2: sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1718_3: Evaṃ yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ, taṃ tathāgatena
atk-s0504a:1718_4: adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi. Imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā
atk-s0504a:1718_5: appattampi atthi, apariyesitvā appattampi atthi, pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā
atk-s0504a:1718_6: pattampi atthi. Sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ. Tato
atk-s0504a:1718_7: eva yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ
atk-s0504a:1718_8: rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ bhagavā sabbaṃ sabbākārena jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā
atk-s0504a:1718_9: passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena
atk-s0504a:1718_10: vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ? Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā
atk-s0504a:1718_11: sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi
atk-s0504a:1718_12: dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tatheva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi
atk-s0504a:1719_0: Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatīti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ, tassa tatheva gatattā tathāgatoti
atk-s0504a:1719_1: vuccati. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “abhisambuddha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ tathāgatasaddena samānatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1719_2: Iminā tathādassibhāvato tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā –
atk-s0504a:1725_0: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ
atk-s0504a:1725_1: viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi, tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ,
atk-s0504a:1725_2: taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1726_0: Yañca, bhikkhave, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca
atk-s0504a:1726_1: visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃ tathā āgatādiatthena tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke
atk-s0504a:1726_2: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1726_3: āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati. Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya
atk-s0504a:1726_4: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ upavattane
atk-s0504a:1726_5: mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0504a:1726_6: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ vemajjhe
atk-s0504a:1726_8: yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati niddisanavasena, lapati uddhisanavasena,
atk-s0504a:1726_9: niddisati paṭiniddisanavasena. Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:1726_10: suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ
atk-s0504a:1726_11: sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ…pe… mohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
atk-s0504a:1726_12: avakkhalitaṃ, ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ
atk-s0504a:1726_13: viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ, ekanteneva tassa sādhanato, no aññathā.
atk-s0504a:1726_14: Tasmā tathaṃ, avitathaṃ, anaññathaṃ. Etena tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti dasseti. Gadaattho
atk-s0504a:1726_15: ayaṃ gatasaddo dakārassa takāraṃ katvā, tasmā tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti attho.
atk-s0504a:1726_16: Atha vā āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado yassāti dakārassa
atk-s0504a:1726_17: takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1727_0: Yathāvādī tathākārīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā
atk-s0504a:1727_1: samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati,
atk-s0504a:1727_2: te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ pahāsi. Ye pana dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā
atk-s0504a:1727_3: viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati, te dhamme
atk-s0504a:1727_4: ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja vihāsi. Tasmā yathāvādī bhagavā, tathākārīti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1727_5: Yathākārī tathāvādīti sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammā paṭipanno sayaṃ yathākārī
atk-s0504a:1727_6: bhagavā, tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī. Bhagavato
atk-s0504a:1727_7: hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā. Tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī
atk-s0504a:1727_8: ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. Yathā ca kāyo,
atk-s0504a:1728_0: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1728_1: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0504a:1728_2: vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, asamo asamasamo
atk-s0504a:1728_3: appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devānaṃ atidevo
atk-s0504a:1728_4: sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tato eva sayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
atk-s0504a:1728_5: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. Yañhi kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ
atk-s0504a:1728_6: viya passatīti daso. Aviparītaṃ āsayādiavabodhena hitūpasaṃhārādinā ca satte, bhāvaññathattūpanayavasena
atk-s0504a:1728_7: saṅkhāre sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattī.
atk-s0504a:1728_8: Ettāvatā abhibhavanaṭṭhena bhagavā attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1729_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0504a:1729_1: ca. Teneva hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe, sabbe parappavādino
atk-s0504a:1729_2: sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso
atk-s0504a:1729_3: ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Tena
atk-s0504a:1729_4: vuttaṃ “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… vasavattī, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1730_0: Gāthāsu sabbalokaṃ abhiññāyāti tedhātukalokasannivāsaṃ jānitvā. Sabbaloke yathātathanti
atk-s0504a:1730_1: tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ yathātathaṃ aviparītaṃ
atk-s0504a:1730_2: jānitvā. Sabbalokavisaṃyuttoti catunnaṃ yogānaṃ anavasesappahānena sabbenapi lokena
atk-s0504a:1730_3: visaṃyutto vippamutto. Anūpayoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi anūpayo tehi upayehi virahito.
atk-s0504a:1731_0: Sabbābhibhūti rūpādīni sabbārammaṇāni, sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ, sabbepi māre abhibhavitvā
atk-s0504a:1731_1: ṭhito. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Sabbaganthappamocanoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike
atk-s0504a:1731_2: mocetvā ṭhito veneyyasantānepi attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanato sabbaganthappamocano.
atk-s0504a:1731_3: Phuṭṭhāssāti phuṭṭhā assa. Karaṇatthe idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, phuṭṭhā anenāti attho. Paramā
atk-s0504a:1731_4: santīti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi tena ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhaṃ. Tenevāha “nibbānaṃ akutobhaya”nti.
atk-s0504a:1731_5: Atha vā paramā santīti uttamā santi. Katarā sāti? Nibbānaṃ. Yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci
atk-s0504a:1731_6: bhayaṃ natthi, tasmā taṃ akutobhayanti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1732_0: Anīghoti niddukkho. Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1732_1: accantābhāvaṃ patto. Vimutto upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya
atk-s0504a:1732_2: phalavimuttiyā vimutto. Esa soti eso so. Sīho anuttaroti parissayānaṃ sahanaṭṭhena,
atk-s0504a:1732_3: kilesānaṃ hananaṭṭhena ca, tathāgato anuttaro sīho nāma. Brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ. Cakkanti
atk-s0504a:1733_0: Itīti evaṃ tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā. Saṅgammāti samāgantvā. Taṃ namassantīti taṃ
atk-s0504a:1733_1: tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā devamanussā namassanti. Mahantehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā
atk-s0504a:1733_2: mahantaṃ, catuvesārajjayogena vītasāradaṃ. Idāni yaṃ vadantā te namassanti, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1734: Iti imasmiṃ catukkanipāte chaṭṭhe sattame ca sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, paṭhamadutiyatatiyadvādasamaterasamesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1755: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0504a:1760: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
